name: Firming Volumfiline Mask

actives.name: Mint Extract and Tea Tree Extract

text:
DAYLISSE — Firming Volumfiline Mask

A sheet mask with an instant lifting and smoothing effect. The formula improves elasticity, deeply hydrates the skin, and supports natural collagen and elastin synthesis, restoring firmness and a youthful appearance.

The mask features Volufiline, a French-developed ingredient by Sederma, derived from plant-based saponins extracted from Asian gardenia. It promotes visible contour lifting by stimulating lipid synthesis in the skin.

A premium elastic peptide enhances the anti-wrinkle effect. Clinical studies have shown stronger wrinkle-reducing performance compared to retinol and vitamin C.

The three-layer structure prevents tearing and deformation while helping the essence absorb quickly, keeping the skin hydrated for hours. Niacinamide strengthens the skin barrier and refreshes tired skin.

The product is registered in the CPNP (Cosmetic Product Notification Portal) and has been tested for skin safety and soothing properties.

Key ingredients: Fermented Lactobacillus Soy Extract; Adenosine; Tea Tree Leaf Extract; Niacinamide; Mint Extract and Tea Tree Extract; Ionized Water; Tocopherol

Composition/INCI: Sh-Oligopeptide-1, Cypress Leaf Extract, Saccharomyces Ferment / Imperata Cylindrica Root Extract, Peppermint Oil, Hexyl Cinnamal, Privet Fruit Extract, Niacinamide, Ethylhexylglycerin, Caffeoyl Tripeptide-1, Linalool, Trehalose, Dipropylene Glycol, Saccharomyces Ferment / Mistletoe Extract, Holly Leaf Extract, Fragrance, PEG-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Tocopherol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Lactobacillus / Soy Ferment Extract, Oregano Leaf Extract, Acetyl Hexapeptide-22, Carbomer, Glycereth-26, Sophora Root Extract, Horsetail Extract, Field Mint Extract, Baikal Skullcap Root Extract, Tea Tree Leaf Oil, Disodium EDTA, Purslane Extract, Butylene Glycol, Anemarrhena Asphodeloides Root Extract, Adenosine, Potassium Glycyrrhizate, Oligopeptide-28, Allantoin, Propanediol, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Willow Bark Extract, Alcohol, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, 1,2-Hexanediol, Japanese Black Pine Leaf Extract, Water, Sodium Chloride, Sh-Octapeptide-4, Sh-Pentapeptide-19, Cinnamon Bark Extract, Arginine, Sh-Decapeptide-7, Glycerin
how_to_use: Apply the mask to cleansed and toned skin. Leave on for 25–30 minutes, then remove and gently pat the remaining essence into the face and neck. Single use.

name: Steamsheet Moisture Shield OilLock Mask
text:
BARULAB — Steamsheet Moisture Shield OilLock Mask

The brand’s most popular mask featuring patented steam technology. It leaves the skin soft, smooth, and elastic, delivering a spa-like experience at home.

The effect is visible after the first use: deeply hydrated and nourished skin without stickiness.

The outer layer is made using the patented INFINITIME™ technology, creating a sealed steam effect. This prevents the highly concentrated OILLOCK™ essence from drying out and maximizes performance.

Heat and steam open pores, allowing nutrients to penetrate deeper. After removal, pores quickly tighten due to temperature contrast, helping retain results.

Suitable for all skin types.

Key ingredients: Coconut Oil; Jojoba Oil; Olive Oil; Phytosterols

Composition/INCI: Hydroxyacetophenone, Niacinamide, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Ethylhexylglycerin, Disodium EDTA, Betaine, Sorbitan Isostearate, Fragrance, Olive Oil, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Phytosterols, Carbomer, Glycereth-26, Butylene Glycol, Jojoba Seed Oil, Adenosine, Coconut Oil, Methyl Gluceth-20, Xanthan Gum, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, 1,2-Hexanediol, Water, Denatured Alcohol, Arginine, Glycerin
how_to_use: Cleanse the skin and apply toner. Place the transparent side of the mask onto the face, ensuring the top layer seals tightly. Leave on for 25–30 minutes, then remove and gently pat in the remaining essence.

name: SEOUL 1988 Serum: Retinal Liposome 2% + Black Ginseng
text:
K-SECRET — SEOUL 1988 Serum: Retinal Liposome 2% + Black Ginseng

An anti-aging serum with 2% liposomal retinal and black ginseng designed to reduce fine lines and expression wrinkles. It helps correct pigmentation, evens skin tone, improves texture, increases elasticity, and regulates sebum production to prevent clogged pores and inflammation.

Retinal is an advanced form of retinol that works up to 11 times faster, providing more efficient skin renewal. The serum can be applied to both face and neck and delivers strong antioxidant protection.

The product has passed safety testing for all skin types, including sensitive skin. Free from silicones, parabens, fragrances, oils, sulfates, and common allergens.

The manufacturer recommends gradually building retinal tolerance. Start with a small amount and increase slowly. Patch testing is advised. Not recommended for use during pregnancy or breastfeeding, or in combination with exfoliating products and vitamin C.

Key ingredients: Black Ginseng Extract; Vitamin C; Tocopherol; Liposomal Retinal (2%); Bakuchiol

Composition/INCI: Tocopherol, Sh-Polypeptide-1, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Rehmannia Chinensis Root Extract, Dioscorea Japonica Root Extract, Sh-Oligopeptide-2, 1,2-Hexanediol, Arctium Lappa Root Extract, Betaine, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Polyglyceryl-10 Oleate, Dipropylene Glycol, Silica, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sh-Oligopeptide-1, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Water, Methyl Gluceth-20, Adenosine, Butylene Glycol, Bakuchiol, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose Distearate, Retinal, Disodium EDTA, Tromethamine, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Phytosteryl/Behenyl/Octyldodecyl Lauroyl Glutamate, Rapeseed Sterols, Sunflower Seed Oil, Cnidium Officinale Root Extract, Glycerin, Sorbitan Stearate, Niacinamide, Aluminum/Magnesium Hydroxide Stearate, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Paeonia Suffruticosa Root Extract, Cholesterol, Carbomer

name: Azulene Soothing Peptide Ampoule
text:
SUR.MEDIC+ — Azulene Soothing Peptide Ampoule

A soothing azulene-based ampoule with peptides designed to deeply hydrate, reduce redness, and improve skin firmness. It can be used as a targeted treatment, a makeup base, or layered under a sheet mask to enhance the effectiveness of active ingredients.

The blue granules deliver concentrated actives deep into the epidermis, intensely moisturizing the skin, strengthening capillary walls, and reinforcing the skin’s protective barrier.

The lightweight, serum-like texture eliminates dryness and flaking with regular use, calms irritation and inflammation, and helps protect the skin from premature aging caused by UV exposure, stress, and environmental aggressors.

Key ingredients: Calamine; Panthenol (Vitamin B5); Artemisia Extract; Peptides; Centella Asiatica; Ceramide NP

how_to_use: Apply 2–3 drops to cleansed face and neck after toner. Allow to absorb, then follow with cream. Use morning and evening.

name: Cica BHA Acne Foam Cleansing
how_to_use: Lather a small amount in wet hands. Massage onto the face for 20–30 seconds, focusing on problem areas, then rinse with warm water. Perform a patch test before first use.

name: SEOUL 1988 Cream: Snail Mucin 93% + Rice
text:
K-SECRET — SEOUL 1988 Cream: Snail Mucin 93% + Rice

A calming and hydrating cream formulated with 93% snail mucin to soothe irritated skin, strengthen the skin barrier, and brighten the complexion.

Snail mucin is obtained through an eco-friendly process without harming snails. The cream is ideal for use alongside retinoids and is suitable for dull, redness-prone, sensitive, and acne-prone skin.

It improves elasticity, smooths texture, deeply hydrates, relieves stress, and calms sensitive skin. Dermatological testing confirmed suitability for sensitive skin. Free from alcohol, parabens, sulfates, oils, artificial colorants, and common allergens.

Key ingredients: Sodium Hyaluronate; Rice Extract; Snail Secretion Filtrate (93%); Allantoin; Panthenol; Ectoin

Composition/INCI: Sorbitan Olivate, Cetearyl Olivate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Panthenol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Rice Extract, Sodium Polyacrylate, Water, Snail Secretion Filtrate, Allantoin, Rice Ferment Filtrate, Butylene Glycol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Benzyl Glycol, Disodium EDTA, Rice Bran Water, Ethylhexylglycerin, Dimethicone, Arginine, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Ectoin, Carbomer
how_to_use: Apply an appropriate amount to cleansed and prepped skin after toner and serum. Allow to absorb before applying SPF or makeup.

name: V10 Multi-Lift Sleeping Pack
text:
BRTC — V10 Multi-Lift Sleeping Pack

A night mask designed for periods when the skin appears tired and dull. The lightweight texture absorbs quickly, requires no rinsing, and works overnight to restore skin vitality.

While you sleep, a powerful cocktail of active ingredients improves skin firmness, density, and radiance. By morning, the facial contour appears lifted, the skin smoother, and the complexion more even.

Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive and atopic skin. Despite being a sleeping pack, it can also be used at any time of day when an instant skin-boosting effect is needed, such as before an important event.

Key ingredients: Niacinamide (Vitamin B3); Vitamin E; Vitamin C; Vitamin B5; Siberian Milkwort Extract; Centella Asiatica; Sea Buckthorn Extract; Vitamin F; Patented VitA EXTRACT Complex

Composition/INCI: Ubiquinone, Gelatin, Pentylene Glycol, CI 77492, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Disodium EDTA, Polysorbate 60, PEG-100 Stearate, Glyceryl Stearate, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Behenyl Alcohol, Cyclohexasiloxane, Betaine, Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose, Phytosqualane, Centella Asiatica Leaf Water, Nicotinoyl SH-Pentapeptide-19, Borago Officinalis Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sea Buckthorn Extract, Carbomer, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Chamomile Flower Extract, Cornflower Extract, Purslane Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Adenosine, Cyanocobalamin, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Caprylyl Glycol, Reishi Mushroom Extract, Platycodon Root Extract, Panthenol, Allantoin, Sage Extract, Niacinamide, Hyacinth Extract, Acetylated Sodium Hyaluronate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Glyceryl Oleate, Water, Cellulose, Orange Oil, Cyclopentasiloxane, Lactose, Pyridoxine HCl, Biotin, Retinyl Palmitate, Glyceryl Linolenate, Tromethamine, Mulberry Bark Extract, Siberian Milkwort Root Extract, Centella Asiatica Extract, Glycerin, Jojoba Esters, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid
how_to_use: In the evening, after cleansing, toning, and serum application, apply a sufficient amount to the face. Remove excess with a tissue if needed. Leave on overnight. In the morning, cleanse as usual. Can also be used in the morning instead of a moisturizer. Suitable for daily use as a night cream for 1–2 weeks or several times per week.

name: Protective Lip Balm Block Stick SPF15
text:
Abib — Protective Lip Balm Block Stick SPF15

A nourishing lip balm that deeply hydrates and protects the delicate skin of the lips from UV damage. Lips contain melanocytes just like facial skin, meaning they are also prone to sunburn and require proper sun protection.

The balm can be used alone or under lipstick or tint for added hydration and shine. Applied in a thicker layer overnight, it works as a restorative lip mask. Unlike traditional SPF products, it does not require removal with oil cleansers.

Key ingredients: Almond Oil; Shea Butter

Composition/INCI: Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Octyldodecanol, Apricot Kernel Oil, Damask Rose Oil, Polyglyceryl-6 Polyricinoleate, Ozokerite, Limonene, Fragrance, Meadowfoam Seed Oil, Olive Oil, Tocopherol, Almond Oil, Shea Butter, Jojoba Esters, Tribehenin, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Linalool, Castor Oil, Safflower Oil, Polyethylene, Polybutene, Benzyl Benzoate, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Palm Oil, Evening Primrose Oil, Camellia Japonica Seed Oil, Sunflower Seed Oil, Candelilla Wax, Meadowfoam Delta-Lactone, Polyglyceryl-2 Diisostearate, Ceresin, Diisostearyl Malate, Dehydroacetic Acid, Citral, Paraffin, Microcrystalline Wax, Trihydroxystearin

name: Effect Water Glow Mask
text:
WONJIN — Effect Water Glow Mask

A deeply hydrating cream mask developed by doctors from one of Seoul’s leading plastic surgery clinics.

The formula contains six types of hyaluronic acid with different molecular sizes, allowing hydration to penetrate all layers of the skin rather than remaining superficial.

Aquaxyl, derived from two types of plant sugars, helps retain moisture within skin cells while supporting continuous hydration renewal.

Key ingredients: Panthenol; Five-Collagen Complex; Amino Acid Complex; Aquaxyl

Composition/INCI: Fragrance, Isoleucine, Histidine, Cetyl-PEG, Aspartic Acid, Disodium EDTA, Dimethicone, Methionine, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Dipropylene Glycol, Betaine, PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Sodium Hyaluronate, Dimethiconol, Sodium PCA, Phenylalanine, Proline, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein Collagen, Valine, Isododecane, Soluble Collagen, Butylene Glycol, Hyaluronic Acid, Threonine, Collagen Amino Acids, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Sodium Soyate Hydrolyzed Glycol, Tyrosine, Glutamic Acid, Serine, Ethylhexylglycerin, Cysteine, Arginine, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Pentylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Glycine, Water, Leucine, Sodium Chloride, Collagen, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Glycerin, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid

name: White Truffle First Spray Serum
text:
D'Alba — White Truffle First Spray Serum

A nourishing spray serum formulated with Italian white truffle extract. It deeply hydrates the skin, supports the hydrolipid balance, and helps prevent premature aging. Organic oils in the formula nourish the skin and reduce transepidermal moisture loss.

The dual-phase texture allows active ingredients to penetrate deeper layers of the skin and work from within. The product is free from parabens, sulfates, artificial colorants, and animal-derived ingredients.

As a bi-phase spray serum, the bottle should be shaken before use. It spreads evenly, absorbs comfortably, and leaves no sticky residue.

Key ingredients: Avocado Oil; White Truffle Extract; Niacinamide (Vitamin B3); Adenosine; Vitamin E; Chia Seed Extract; Hyaluronic Acid; Botanical Extract Complex

how_to_use: Shake well before use. Spray onto cleansed facial skin after toner or throughout the day. Can be used in place of a serum.

name: Enriching Avo Clay Mask
text:
Teeheehee — Enriching Avo Clay Mask

A nourishing clay mask in a convenient stick format developed for fast-paced urban lifestyles. It applies easily without getting hands dirty, making the process hygienic and time-efficient.

Traditional clay masks tend to dry quickly and can dehydrate the skin. This formula avoids that issue by remaining comfortable on the skin, delivering visible results in just five minutes. The mask hydrates, strengthens the skin barrier, and leaves the skin feeling firm and velvety.

The rich green color reflects the brand’s vegan philosophy and natural composition. Developed in collaboration with Organic Bridge Laboratory and certified by the U.S. FDA and Vegan organizations.

Key ingredients: Quinoa Extract; Ceramide Complex; Green Tea Extract; Centella Asiatica; Avocado Fruit Extract

Composition/INCI: Fragrance, Cetearyl Olivate, Sodium Stearate, Kaolin, Purified Water, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Green Tea Extract, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Quinoa Extract, Gellan Gum, Bentonite Clay, Butylene Glycol, Propylene Glycol, Titanium Dioxide, Ceramide NP, Propanediol, Chromium Oxide Green, 1,2-Hexanediol, Sweet Almond Extract, Sorbitan Olivate, Iron Oxide Yellow, Lavender Extract, Centella Extract, Avocado Fruit Extract
how_to_use: Apply to dry, cleansed facial skin. Rinse off after 5 minutes. Suitable for daily use. For puffiness, apply with gentle pressure along massage lines for a lymphatic drainage effect.

name: Idebenone Microfiber Mask
how_to_use: After toner, apply serum and allow it to absorb. Apply the mask for 10–20 minutes, remove, and gently pat remaining essence into the face and neck. Finish with cream. Single use.

name: White Truffle Intensive Eye Patch
text:
D'Alba — White Truffle Intensive Eye Patch

Hydrogel eye patches formulated to provide intensive care for the delicate eye area. They deeply hydrate, reduce signs of fatigue, restore radiance, and help combat early signs of aging.

The skin around the eyes is significantly thinner and requires especially gentle care. These patches contain 70% vegan collagen and are not tested on animals, in line with the brand’s ethical standards.

D'Alba developed and patented the BIO-Presudanne ingredient, which helps improve elasticity and brighten the under-eye area. The innovative formula gradually turns transparent as the active ingredients are absorbed, indicating the optimal time for removal.

Key ingredients: Panthenol (Vitamin B5); Hyaluronic Acid; White Truffle Extract; Patented BIO Component

name: Dr. Hands Sheet Mask
text:
Me&You — Dr. Hands Sheet Mask

A sheet mask developed by a network of prestigious dermatology clinics in Korea. It delivers intense hydration, leaving the skin refreshed and plump, as if quenched after dehydration. Suitable for all skin types.

Composition/INCI: Niacinamide, Isoleucine, Histidine, Aspartic Acid, Methionine, Beta-Glucan, Trehalose, Dipropylene Glycol, Betaine, Panthenol, Tyrosine, Lysine, Allantoin, Proline, Carbomer, Valine, Disodium EDTA, Adenosine, Threonine, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Aloe Extract, Glutamic Acid, Serine, Propanediol, Cysteine, Xanthan Gum, Zeolites, 1,2-Hexanediol, Glycine, Willow Bark Extract, Water, Leucine, Tromethamine, Tea Tree Leaf Oil, Arginine, Glycerin, Polyglyceryl-4 Laurate, Tocopheryl Acetate

name: Madagascar Centella Light Cleansing Oil
text:
SKIN1004 — Madagascar Centella Light Cleansing Oil

A gentle cleansing oil formulated with Centella Asiatica and six additional botanical oils. Effectively removes sunscreen, foundation, waterproof makeup, and micro-pollution while cleansing pores.

The lightweight texture is suitable even for first-time users of botanical oil cleansers. It gently exfoliates dead skin cells, restores smoothness and elasticity, helps prevent blackheads and comedones, and supports the skin’s hydrolipid balance.

Key ingredients: Centella Asiatica; Panthenol; Citric Acid

Composition/INCI: Sorbeth-30 Tetraoleate, Limonene, Geranium Flower Oil, Centella Asiatica Extract (10,000 ppm), Bergamot Fruit Oil, Ethylhexylglycerin, Olive Fruit Oil, Linalool, Sunflower Seed Oil, Jojoba Seed Oil, Ethylhexyl Stearate, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Damask Rose Flower Oil
how_to_use: Apply a small amount to dry skin and massage for 1–2 minutes until makeup dissolves. Rinse thoroughly with warm water.

name: Black Clay Mask
text:
BARULAB — Black Clay Mask

A purifying clay mask designed to help achieve clear skin and refined pores with minimal effort. It removes dead skin cells and helps regulate excess sebum production.

Niacinamide and adenosine work together to hydrate the skin, improve texture, and reduce the appearance of pigmentation and inflammation. Especially suitable for oily and problem-prone skin prone to clogged pores and comedones.

The cotton-based sheet material is gentle and non-irritating, making it suitable even for sensitive skin.

Key ingredients: Kaolin; Charcoal; Volcanic Ash; Panthenol (Vitamin B5); Bentonite; White Mulberry Extract

Composition/INCI: Silkworm Extract, CI 77499, Niacinamide, Ethylhexylglycerin, Eclipta Prostrata Extract, Disodium EDTA, Volcanic Ash, White Mulberry Leaf Extract, Panthenol, Fragrance, Kaolin (200,000 ppm), Mica, Korean Pasque Flower Extract, Stearic Acid, White Mulberry Fruit Extract, Butylene Glycol, Bismuth Oxychloride, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexanediol, Allantoin, Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Xanthan Gum, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Polysorbate 80, 1,2-Hexanediol, Water, Purslane Extract, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Charcoal Powder, Adenosine, Tromethamine, Bentonite (37,000 ppm), Centella Asiatica Extract, Glycerin
how_to_use: Apply to cleansed skin after toner. Leave on for 30–40 minutes until fully dry. Rinse thoroughly with warm water and follow with moisturizer. Use no more than once per week.

name: Silky Suncream
text:
Sonnemur — Silky Suncream

Consistent use of SPF is one of the most effective ways to maintain youthful, radiant, and even-toned skin. No anti-aging cream delivers the same long-term benefits as daily sun protection.

Silky Suncream offers maximum sun protection with SPF50+/PA+++ and blocks both UVB and UVA rays. Korean dermatology clinics recommend this sunscreen for post-procedure care after treatments such as mesotherapy.

The patented Repair Control CLR™ technology helps restore skin damaged by UV exposure. Adenosine and niacinamide enhance the anti-aging and skin-repair benefits.

Unlike traditional sunscreens, this formula has a lightweight texture, absorbs quickly, and leaves no white cast.

Key ingredients: Adenosine; Niacinamide

Composition/INCI: Water, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Butylene Glycol, Diethylamino Hydroxybenzoyl Hexyl Benzoate, Niacinamide, Cyclopentasiloxane, Ethylhexyl Triazone, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Bis-Ethylhexyloxyphenol Methoxyphenyl Triazine, Silica, Adenosine, Dimethicone, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Glycerin, Carbomer, Tromethamine, Ethylhexylglycerin, Disodium EDTA
how_to_use: Apply evenly to the face as the final step of the morning skincare routine. Reapply as needed when exposed to sunlight.

name: Agingment Firming Cream
text:
BOTANITY — Agingment Firming Cream

Botanity returns to the box with a nourishing, smoothing cream. An advanced emulsification process (combining two normally hard-to-mix phases) creates a comfortable texture that absorbs quickly, leaves no greasy shine or stickiness, and preps the skin well for makeup.

Clinical testing confirmed the formula’s anti-aging and rejuvenating benefits. The cream helps hydrate the skin while improving firmness, smoothness, and elasticity.

The patented Signal A-complex™ supports a youthful-looking complexion. It combines bakuchiol, plant-based collagen, and the patented Soliprin™ blend. The complex provides anti-inflammatory and antioxidant support, helping protect the skin from oxidative stress related to UV exposure and environmental pollution.

Studies also indicate that these components perform more effectively together than individually, delivering a more noticeable firming and revitalizing effect.

Suitable for all skin types and especially recommended for dull, tired-looking skin with visible signs of aging. For very sensitive skin, patch testing is recommended.

Key ingredients: Plant-Based Collagen; Acacia Extract; Multi-Molecular Hyaluronic Acid Complex (5 types); Bakuchiol; Effipulp

how_to_use: After toner and serum, apply a small amount to the face, neck, and décolleté as the final step of your routine. Massage gently until absorbed. Use daily, morning and evening.

name: The Real Noni Ultimate Eye Cream
text:
Celimax — The Real Noni Ultimate Eye Cream

Why is an eye cream important? The skin around the eyes has fewer sebaceous glands, so it dries out faster, which can accelerate the appearance of fine lines. This area needs both hydration and nourishment—while maintaining balance: too much richness may contribute to milia, and too little may lead to increased dryness and wrinkles.

This cream has a light herbal scent and is very economical—just a small amount is enough for one side of the face. It can also be used on areas that tend to show early signs of aging, such as the neck, nasolabial folds, and the glabella (between the brows).

Formulated specifically for the thin, delicate eye area, it is suitable for gentle massage to help reduce puffiness. It hydrates and helps retain moisture, nourishes, supports elasticity, and absorbs quickly without leaving a greasy film or shine.

Key ingredients: Shea Butter; Peptide Complex; Noni Extract; Bakuchiol; Ceramide NP

Composition/INCI: Oligopeptide-32, Sodium Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Niacinamide, Ethylhexylglycerin, Bakuchiol, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Hydrogenated Poly(C6-12 Olefin), Hydrogenated Lecithin, Disodium EDTA, Solanum Melongena (Eggplant) Fruit Extract, Azadirachta Indica Flower Extract, Morinda Citrifolia Fruit Extract (36.26%), Tocopherol, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Azadirachta Indica Leaf Extract, Shea Butter, Beeswax, Morinda Citrifolia Seed Oil (2%), Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose Distearate, Adenosine, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Ceramide NP, Phenyl Trimethicone, Glyceryl Stearate, Jojoba Oil, Copper Tripeptide-1, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Butylene Glycol, Coccinia Indica Fruit Extract, Rosemary Leaf Oil, 1,2-Hexanediol, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Water, Cetearyl Alcohol, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Phytosteryl/Isostearyl/Cetyl/Stearyl/Behenyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Dipropylene Glycol, Ocimum Sanctum Leaf Extract, Oligopeptide-29, Corallina Officinalis Extract, Polyisobutene, Glycerin, Sorbitan Oleate
how_to_use: After toner and serum, apply a small amount (1–2 pumps) to the eye area and gently massage with the applicator. Use twice daily, morning and evening. Do not apply a thick layer to avoid unwanted puffiness. Patch test before first use (inner elbow or a small area of the neck).

name: Powder Wash
text:
Juice to Cleanse — Powder Wash

This powder is not about masking imperfections—it helps improve them by smoothing tone and texture. Juice to Cleanse Powder Wash is a home exfoliating cleanser: when mixed with water, it transforms into a dense, gentle foam.

The brand is known for its extraction approach. Exotic fruit extracts are obtained via cold pressing at 4°C, similar to fresh juice, to preserve beneficial properties while minimizing unnecessary components.

Thanks to its gentle formula, it can be used without special prep at any time of day, and if needed, even twice daily.

The powder features effective “green” ingredients like avocado, papaya, and green tea to support healthy-looking skin. A fresh scent with avocado and broccoli notes makes the routine more pleasant.

Use it as your cleanser before the rest of your routine, or to remove residue from makeup, including oily textures and SPF products.

The key heroes are enzymes and vitamin C. Enzymes remove dead skin cells and help restore softness without the abrasiveness of scrubs. Vitamin C supports radiance and helps visibly even skin tone.

With regular gentle exfoliation, the skin looks fresher and healthier, and imperfections become less noticeable.

Key ingredients: Papaya Juice; Broccoli Extract; Green Tea Extract; Avocado Extract; Camellia Leaf Extract; Cucumber Juice

Composition/INCI: Pulsatilla Koreana Flower Extract, Papain, Glucose, Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Water, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Corn Starch, Green Tea Extract, Broccoli Extract, Cabbage Leaf Extract, Zanthoxylum Extract, Ascorbic Acid, Cellulose Gum, 1,2-Hexanediol, Sodium Chloride, Lactose, Cucumber Extract, Usnea Extract, Avocado Fruit Extract
how_to_use: One sachet is intended for one use, but in practice it often lasts for two. Mix the powder with a small amount of water, apply to the face with gentle massage motions to create a dense foam, then rinse thoroughly with lukewarm or cool water.

name: Despot Powder Ampoule C
text:
11Huesday — Despot Powder Ampoule C

A three-week skin-enhancing program powered by strong antioxidants—an “antioxidant bomb” for the complexion. Pure vitamin C combined with ingredients that support penetration and stability helps target dullness, uneven tone, and visible signs of photoaging.

Vitamin C oxidizes quickly, which reduces effectiveness. To address this, 11Huesday uses a packaging approach that keeps the formula potent: vitamin C powder is combined with other components right before use.

Key points:
- No heavy film: absorbs quickly without stickiness, even when layered.
- Higher performance: vitamin E helps vitamin C work more efficiently, while ferulic acid improves stability.
- Hydration support: hyaluronic acid helps prevent moisture loss and provides intensive hydration.

Expected results after a 3-week course:
- Brighter, more radiant-looking skin
- Reduced appearance of photoaging and hyperpigmentation
- Improved overall skin condition
- Less visible post-acne marks

Free from artificial fragrances. Dermatologist-tested with low irritation potential.

Key ingredients: Glutathione; Ferulic Acid + Tocopherol; Vitamin C (Ascorbic Acid); Hyaluronic Acid Complex (5 types); Niacinamide 2%

Composition/INCI: Tocopherol, Menadione, Coptis Japonica Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, 1,2-Hexanediol, Betaine, Glutathione, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Ascorbyl Glucoside, Panthenol, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Polyglyceryl-10 Diisostearate, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Water, Ferulic Acid, Allantoin, Alpha-Arbutin, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Butylene Glycol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hyaluronic Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Caffeine, Polysorbate 80, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride
how_to_use: Shake well before each use. After toner, apply 2–3 drops and gently distribute over the face using tapping motions. Use 1–2 times daily. Do not use in the same routine as retinol—split between morning and evening. During the course, apply sunscreen before going outside. The set is designed for 3 weeks (one ampoule per week).

name: Bulgarian Rose Whitening Essence
text:
Of Way — Bulgarian Rose Whitening Essence

This essence works like a soft beauty filter: it gently brightens and refreshes the complexion and helps reduce a dull cast. The formula features rose water and rice extract from Jeju Island, known for its unique natural environment.

Use it like a serum under your cream.

Composition/INCI: Glyceryl Caprylate, Pentylene Glycol, Alpha-Bisabolol, Sodium Phytate, Rice Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Butylene Glycol, Hyaluronic Acid, Citric Acid, Damask Rose Water (55%), Propanediol, Sclerotium Gum, Centella Asiatica Leaf Extract, Glycerin, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid
how_to_use: Apply an adequate amount to cleansed, toned skin. Massage gently over the face until absorbed. Follow with emulsion, cream, or a sleeping mask.

name: Double Serum All in One Multi Balm
text:
d'Alba — Double Serum All in One Multi Balm

A vegan multi-balm stick that is especially useful during cold seasons and for addressing visible signs of aging. It supports a smoother, more even-looking complexion and helps reduce the appearance of dryness-related lines.

Plant-based collagen helps improve the look of skin firmness and smoothness, while a blend of natural oils supports the hydrolipid balance, nourishes deeply, and restores elasticity.

The balm combines a highly concentrated serum based on the brand’s patented Trufferol complex (white truffle extract + tocopherol). These components help support skin renewal processes, encourage collagen-related pathways, and address the look of age-related pigmentation.

Designed for both face and lips, it reduces dryness and helps prevent cracking. It absorbs comfortably without a heavy film. The stick format is convenient for travel and on-the-go use.

Not tested on animals. Especially recommended for dry, dull skin with early or visible fine lines.

Key ingredients: Botanical Oil Complex; Glutathione; Tocopherol; White Truffle Extract; Vegan Collagen

Composition/INCI: Jasmine Extract, Freesia Extract, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Hexyl Cinnamal, Polyglyceryl-2 Isostearate/Dimer Dilinoleate Copolymer, Olive Oil, Argan Oil, Beta Vulgaris (Beet) Root Extract, Glucose, Octyldodecanol, Narcissus Tazetta Bulb Extract, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Sweet Almond Oil, Cardiospermum Halicacabum Flower/Leaf/Vine Extract, Perilla Leaf Extract, Sea Buckthorn Fruit Oil, Jojoba Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Citral, Rose Flower Extract, Soybean Oil, Lotus Flower Extract, Avocado Oil, Bisabolol, Fragrance, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Echium Plantagineum Seed Oil, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Chamomile Flower Extract, Lily Bulb Extract, Citronellol, Linalool, Ceramide NP, Dehydroacetic Acid, Polyethylene, Ascorbic Acid, Tocopheryl Acetate, Evening Primrose Oil, Synthetic Wax, Limonene, Camellia Japonica Seed Oil, Sunflower Seed Oil, Anemarrhena Asphodeloides Root Extract, Butylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Water, Carrot Root Extract, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil Unsaponifiables, Iris Florentina Root Extract, Mannose, Angelica Gigas Extract, White Truffle Extract, Monascus Extract, Collagen Extract, Macadamia Nut Oil, Centella Asiatica Extract, Glutathione, Camellia Sinensis Seed Oil, Shea Butter, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Microcrystalline Wax, Borago Officinalis Extract
how_to_use: Apply locally to dry, cleansed areas of the face or lips. Massage gently until absorbed. Use daily in the morning and/or evening. Patch test before first use. Can also be applied to the neck, décolleté, hands, and areas prone to dryness (e.g., around the nasolabial folds or forehead center) before foundation.

name: Centella Mask Pack
text:
Mixsoon — Centella Mask Pack

Mixsoon is built around a minimalist approach for dehydrated, oily, combination, and sensitive skin—so this lightweight, eco-friendly sheet mask fits the brand’s philosophy.

The formula contains a high concentration of Centella Asiatica extract, known for soothing and anti-inflammatory benefits. It also helps support microcirculation and provides antioxidant protection. Centella can reduce irritation and support recovery of compromised skin.

The gel-like sheet adheres closely to the skin, helping active ingredients absorb effectively while calming irritation and supporting balanced sebum levels.

Ideal after professional treatments, peels, or when using home devices. The ingredient list is intentionally simple to minimize the risk of sensitivity.

Composition/INCI: Hydroxyacetophenone, Centella Asiatica Extract (200,000 ppm), Ethylhexylglycerin, Disodium EDTA, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Sodium Carbomer, Xanthan Gum, Butylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Water, Glycerin
how_to_use: After cleansing, apply toner. Place the mask evenly over the face and leave on for 10–20 minutes. Remove and gently pat the remaining essence into the face and neck. Single use. Patch test before first use if you have very sensitive skin.

name: Salmon DA Microfiber Mask
text:
Be'Balance — Salmon DA Microfiber Mask

A microfiber mask featuring salmon DNA (PDRN), a trending ingredient worldwide, designed to address fine lines, dullness, and reduced elasticity. The formula nourishes the skin and supports a more youthful-looking complexion.

High-performance ingredients are encapsulated in liposomes to improve absorption and help deliver actives deeper into the epidermis.

The formula contains 5,000 ppm salmon roe extract. It supports anti-aging care and helps even the look of skin tone, while the Pure Medi complex promotes collagen-related pathways and helps reduce visible signs of aging.

One key peptide, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, supports the production of glycosaminoglycans (GAGs)—natural “water reservoirs” in the skin that help the face look plumper and more firm. It also supports collagen, fibronectin, and hyaluronic acid-related processes, improving texture and the look of wrinkles.

Key ingredients: Peptides (7 types); Salicornia Europaea Extract; Salmon Roe Extract; Salmon DNA (PDRN); Reed Extract; Peptide Complex

Composition/INCI: Ubiquinone, PEG-5 Rapeseed Sterol, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Hexapeptide-9, 1,2-Hexanediol, Glutathione, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Tocopheryl Acetate, Propylene Glycol, Reed Extract, Dipropylene Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Ceteareth-3, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Ceteareth-5, Bis-PEG-18 Methyl Ether Dimethylsilane, Allantoin, Tripeptide-1, Macadamia Seed Oil, Purslane Extract, Butylene Glycol, Water, Caprylyl Glycol, Copper Tripeptide-1, Salmon Roe Extract, PEG-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Disodium EDTA, Palmitoyl Pentapeptide-4, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Astaxanthin, Tromethamine, DNA, Cyanocobalamin, Glycerin, Xanthan Gum, Canola Sterol, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Alanine/Histidine/Lysine Polypeptide Copper HCl, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Fragrance, Cholesterol, Carbomer, Glyceryl Acrylate/Acrylic Acid Copolymer, Thioctic Acid
how_to_use: After toner, apply serum and allow it to absorb. Apply the mask for 10–20 minutes, remove, and gently pat remaining essence into the face and neck. Finish with cream. Single use. (Set includes three components.)

name: Neroli Garden Effector
text:
URIID — Neroli Garden Effector

We can now add a new term to the beauty dictionary: “effector.” The star here is neroli extract — the blossom of the orange tree. The formula is 99% made of this ingredient. It’s literally a “liquid flower.”

Neroli oil is often used for relaxation and recovery after stress. In skincare, it works in a similar way: it helps calm and restore skin after exposure to city dust, dry air, wind, and other irritating factors.

At the same time, neroli oil is an effective anti-aging ingredient. It can support skin regeneration, help soften the look of fine lines, and has sebum-regulating properties.

How to use:
This URIID product is multifunctional: use it as an extra hydrating step on top of your cream, as a mist, or even instead of a peel for gentle exfoliation — soak a cotton pad and wipe your face after cleansing, before moisturizing.

Key ingredients: Neroli Flower Oil

Composition/INCI: Pentylene Glycol, Neroli Flower Extract (997,000 ppm), Polyglyceryl-10 Myristate, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Neroli Flower Oil (25 ppm), Glycerin
how_to_use: This URIID product is multifunctional: use it as an extra hydrating step on top of your cream, as a mist, or even instead of a peel for gentle exfoliation — soak a cotton pad and wipe your face after cleansing, before moisturizing.

name: U PLUS BB CREAM
text:
SPICULE-X — U PLUS BB CREAM

Meet a complexion product that creates a “no-makeup makeup” effect, making skin look even and smooth while delicately blurring fine lines, pigmentation, redness, and breakouts.

The coverage comes in one universal shade that adapts to most skin tones and feels weightless. If you prefer fuller coverage, simply apply U Plus BB Cream in two layers.
Thanks to SPF 30, you don’t need an extra sunscreen step. The SPF uses a mixed-filter technology to protect against rays of different wavelengths.

This cream doesn’t just conceal imperfections — it helps address them thanks to an impressive set of soothing and skincare ingredients. For example, three peptides target the appearance of wrinkles, supporting collagen production and helping skin look firmer. Snail mucin helps restore smoothness and bounce, softening the look of fine lines and dehydration creases.

Key ingredients: Arbutin; Panthenol (Pro-Vitamin B5); Acetyl Hexapeptide; Portulaca Oleracea Extract; Jojoba Seed Oil; Centella Asiatica; Aloe; Palmitoyl Peptide; Copper Tripeptide; Snail Mucin Filtrate

Composition/INCI: Aloe Leaf Juice, Polysorbate 20, Ultramarines, Macadamia Oil, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Dimethicone, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Isoamyl p-Methoxycinnamate, Panthenol, Potassium Sorbate, Zinc Oxide, Propylene Glycol, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Caprylyl Glycol, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Carbomer, Beeswax, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Snail Mucin, Magnesium Stearate, Talc, Titanium Dioxide, Adenosine, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Citric Acid, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Jojoba Oil, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Yellow Iron Oxide, Allantoin, Phenyl Trimethicone, Magnesium Sulfate, Algin, Sodium Benzoate, Butylene Glycol, Disodium Adenosine Triphosphate, Aluminum Hydroxide, Water, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-7, Sodium Hydroxide, Papaya Extract, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Arbutin, Diisostearyl Malate, Centella Asiatica Extract, Glycerin, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Microcrystalline Wax
how_to_use: Apply the needed amount with fingertips or a damp makeup sponge onto prepped skin and blend evenly. You can also use a dry sponge for fuller coverage (this may slightly increase product usage).

name: Madagascar Centella Cream
text:
SKIN1004 — Madagascar Centella Cream

In this 82Box edition we included a moisturizing cream with Madagascar centella from SKIN1004. This ingredient was one of the first to be widely used in Korean skincare, and it feels almost made for harsh winters: cold outdoor temperatures, strong winds, and dry indoor air from heating.

The cream works as a comfortable everyday base during the cold season. It suits all skin types, has a light texture, a neutral scent, and layers well with masks, serums, and other skincare. It also performs well as a base under foundation.

SKIN1004’s signature ingredient is Centella Asiatica grown in the untouched lands of Madagascar. The island’s climate is ideal for this plant, which is why Madagascar centella is often valued for its potency and concentration of beneficial properties.

Centella is a powerful restorative ingredient originally adopted into beauty from medical use. It has been known for over three thousand years and was used when skin needed recovery.

In skincare, centella helps:
- support the skin barrier
- soften the look of fine lines and improve elasticity
- calm inflammation and irritation
- nourish and help even the appearance of skin tone

Like other products in the box, the cream is not tested on animals. It has an ECOCERT certificate confirming eco-friendly standards and natural origin of ingredients. Clinical testing reported no allergic reactions.

Key ingredients: Linoleic Acid; Shea Butter; Adenosine; TECA (Centella Actives); Hyaluronic Acid

Composition/INCI: Olive Oil (Olea Europaea), Ethylhexylglycerin, Soybean Sprout Extract (Glycine Soja), Hydrogenated Lecithin, Biosaccharide Gum-1, Linoleic Acid, Orange Oil (Citrus Aurantium Dulcis), Trehalose, Chamomile Flower Extract (Chamomilla Recutita), Betaine, Panthenol, Meadowfoam Seed Oil (Limnanthes Alba), Linolenic Acid, Ceramide NP, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Shea Butter (Butyrospermum Parkii), Madecassic Acid, Macadamia Oil (Macadamia Ternifolia), Carbomer, Squalane, Butylene Glycol, Adenosine, Asiatic Acid, Niacinamide, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Sodium Carbomer, Caprylyl Glycol, Xanthan Gum, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Pentylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Water, Centella Asiatica Extract (9?), Asiaticoside, Lavender Oil (Lavandula Angustifolia), Tromethamine, Licorice Root Extract (Glycyrrhiza Glabra), Erythritol, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Glycerin, Madecassoside
how_to_use: Use after cleansing, toning, and serum, but before SPF and makeup. Apply a sufficient amount and wait a few minutes for absorption.

name: Pro B5 Microfiber Mask
text:
Be'Balance — Pro B5 Microfiber Mask

A mask with panthenol and ceramides designed to strengthen the skin barrier, deliver intensive hydration, and improve the feel of skin density. The formula is rich in nourishing components that help protect skin and support a smooth, radiant look.

Ceramides are essential for building the skin barrier. They make up a large part of the skin’s lipid layer, protect against external stressors, and help prevent moisture loss. When ceramides are depleted, skin can become dry, dehydrated, and rough.

Liposomes help reduce downsides by stabilizing ceramides and improving delivery into deeper layers so actives can be better utilized.

According to the brand’s testing, skin hydration increased by 140% after use. Suitable for all skin types.

How to use: after toner, apply serum and let it absorb. Place the mask on the face for 10–20 minutes, remove it, and gently pat in remaining essence over face and neck. Finish with a cream. Single-use mask.

Key ingredients: Ceramide Complex; Panthenol (Pro-Vitamin B5); 8 Types of Hyaluronic Acid; Patented Fruit Complex Extract

Composition/INCI: 1,2-Hexanediol, Hydroxyacetophenone, Pentylene Glycol, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Dimethicone, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Ceramide AP, Hydrogenated Starch Hydrolysate, Panthenol, Pomegranate Extract, Ceramide OP, Hydroxyethyl Urea, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Fragrance, Ceramide AS, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Carbomer, Chamomile Flower Extract, Disodium EDTA, Butylene Glycol, Hyaluronic Acid, Ceramide NP, Propanediol, Ginkgo Biloba Extract, Baobab Seed Oil, Arginine, Sodium Polyacrylate, Glycosyl Trehalose, Fig Extract, Acetylated Sodium Hyaluronate, Water, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Purified Water, Erythritol, Lecithin, Glycerin, Ceramide NS, Mulberry Fruit Extract
how_to_use: After toner, apply serum and let it absorb. Place the mask on for 10–20 minutes, remove it, then gently pat in the remaining essence over face and neck. Finish with a cream. Single-use mask.

name: Cica Calming Mask
text:
Ttat — Cica Calming Mask

The Cica Calming Mask is a close “relative” of the brand’s Yuja Radiance Mask. They pair well: during the week you can use one, then 2–3 days later use the other.

This mask focuses on intensive recovery and is suitable for very irritated, dry, and compromised skin. It doesn’t just aim for a “younger” look — it supports overall skin health and recovery.

The product has clinically confirmed results from an irritation test conducted by P&K Skin Research Center in Seoul.

Key ingredients: FRUCTAN Complex (High-Molecular-Weight Hyaluronic Acid-Based); Tea Tree Leaf Extract; Centella Asiatica Extract; Mexican Juniper Oil

Composition/INCI: Glyceryl Caprylate, Madecassoside (5 ppb), Ethylhexylglycerin, Disodium EDTA, Beta-Glucan, Sage Oil, Betaine, Tocopherol, Panthenol, Sorbitan Isostearate, Purified Water, Fructan, Sodium Hyaluronate, Asiatic Acid (0.1 ppb), Portulaca Extract, Butylene Glycol, Lactobacillus Ferment, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Allantoin, Madecassic Acid (0.1 ppb), Propanediol, Asiaticoside (0.1 ppb), Xanthan Gum, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Eucalyptus Leaf Oil, 1,2-Hexanediol, Centella Asiatica Extract (50 ppb), Tea Tree Leaf Extract, Mexican Juniper Oil, Tea Tree Leaf Water, Glycerin
how_to_use: After cleansing, prep skin with toner. Apply the mask evenly and leave on for 15–20 minutes. Remove and gently pat in the remaining essence.

name: Alluring Liquid Shadow
text:
IM'UNNY — Alluring Liquid Shadow

At first glance, it’s just a liquid eyeshadow. We chose it because of the technology that makes it long-wearing, so you don’t need to touch up eye makeup during the day.

The secret is in the textures: the creators combined a lightweight oil base with pigmented powder. When applied, the oil binds the powder particles and fixes the product on the lids until you decide to remove it. After application, the oil evaporates without clogging pores, leaving a comfortable creamy finish.

These shadows won’t let you down: they don’t flake, and they resist sweat and water drops (or tears). The shade in the box is a natural brown, and you can easily adjust intensity by layering.

Another reason to love it: application takes seconds and you can use your fingers — no special brushes needed. A great option when you’re always on the go.

Key ingredients: Apricot Kernel Oil; Olive Oil; Rosehip Fruit Oil

Composition/INCI: Black Iron Oxide, Argan Oil, Octyldodecanol, Apricot Kernel Oil, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Yellow Iron Oxide, Meadowfoam Seed Oil, Olive Oil, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Hexylene Glycol, Isododecane, Talc, Titanium Dioxide, Silica, Phenoxyethanol, Propylene Carbonate, Jojoba Oil, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Yellow Colorant No. 4, Hydrogenated Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Aluminum Hydroxide, Dicalcium Phosphate, Caprylyl Glycol, Rosehip Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate
how_to_use: Apply the needed amount to eyelids with the applicator and blend immediately with your fingers. For a more intense shade, apply 2–3 layers. You may also use makeup brushes.

name: Calming Herbs Mask
text:
RE:P x 82Box special edition — Calming Herbs Mask

An at-home spa with an herbal clay mask? Absolutely. Calendula and chamomile don’t just gently cleanse pores and impurities — they also calm inflammation, leaving skin soft and smooth.

The creamy texture with finely milled herbs provides antiseptic and soothing benefits without a tight, over-dry feel. When you apply it with massaging motions, you get a light scrub effect: it helps lift dead skin cells and break down oil plugs.

Thanks to natural oils and extracts, the mask doesn’t fully dry down — meaning it won’t over-dry the skin and can suit even sensitive and dry skin types.

The mask is free from six common parabens, benzyl alcohol, chlorphenesin, sorbic acid, benzoic acid, and benzophenone-4.

Key ingredients: Chamomile Extract; Damask Rose Extract; Calendula; Kaolin (White Clay)

Composition/INCI: Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Water, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Coptis Japonica Extract, Azadirachta Indica Leaf Extract, Anthemis Nobilis Flower Powder, Melissa Officinalis Flower/Leaf/Stem Water, Polyglyceryl-10 Myristate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Artemisia Annua Extract, Pulsatilla Koreana Extract, Palmitic Acid, Polyglyceryl-2 Stearate, Usnea Barbata (Lichen) Extract, Zanthoxylum Piperitum Fruit Extract, Butylene Glycol, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Cetyl Alcohol, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Helichrysum Arenarium Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, Ethylhexylglycerin, Tromethamine, Symphytum Officinale Leaf Extract, Propanediol, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower Water, Kaolin, Aniba Rosodora (Rosewood) Wood Oil, Rosa Damascena Flower Water, Water, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Calendula Officinalis Flower, Glycerin, Xanthan Gum, Stearic Acid, Stearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Helichrysum Italicum Flower Water
how_to_use: Apply an adequate amount to cleansed skin after toner. Massage to spread evenly and leave for 5–10 minutes. Rinse thoroughly with warm water. Finish with a cream.

name: Bean Essence
text:
Mixsoon — Bean Essence

This 100% vegan essence has been at peak popularity thanks to a minimalist formula with only a few ingredients. It helps support a weakened skin barrier and can reduce redness, breakouts, and dryness.

Natural fermented components help protect the skin, which is especially useful during temperature and humidity swings. Because of its clean formula and strong performance, this indie brand became a favorite for many Korean consumers, and the product won a Glowpick beauty award in Korea in 2021.

The essence has an unusual stretchy texture that can resemble snail mucin. In reality, this comes from fermented beans rich in vitamins and amino acids that support the skin. Despite the texture, it absorbs quickly and doesn’t leave stickiness, making it suitable for oily, combination, and problem-prone skin.

It helps improve the look of uneven tone, hydrates by supporting moisture retention, and can help reduce excess sebum, which may support fewer clogged pores.

You can use it as part of a routine with toner and cream, or on its own. It can also be used for facial massage 2–3 times a week.

Key ingredients: Saccharomyces Ferment Filtrate; Fermented Pear Extract; Fermented Soybean Extract

Composition/INCI: Saccharomyces Ferment Filtrate, Lactobacillus/Fermented Soybean Extract, Propanediol, Water, Lactobacillus-Fermented Pomegranate Fruit Extract, Glycerin, Lactobacillus-Fermented Pear Extract
how_to_use:
As an essence/serum: use twice daily after toner or hydrating pads. Apply 2–3 drops and gently spread over areas that need care. Finish with a cream.

For massage 2–3 times a week:
1) Apply the essence and massage gently with your palms.
2) When you feel small “rolls” forming under your fingers, add a bit more essence and continue.
3) Rinse with warm water.

name: Birch Juice Moisturizing Mask
text:
ROUND LAB — Birch Juice Moisturizing Mask

Did you know birch sap has unique hydrating properties? The birch trees used by Round Lab grow in an eco-friendly region at over 800 meters above sea level in Inje County.

Birch sap, amino acids, and minerals work together like a true hydrating ampoule, while hyaluronic acid helps create a protective “film” on the skin’s surface to reduce moisture loss.

The mask sheet is made from 100% cotton without chemical additives.

name: Azulene Soothing pH Cleanser
text:
SUR.MEDIC+ — Azulene Soothing pH Cleanser

A gentle cleanser with azulene from SUR.MEDIC+ designed to remove all types of impurities. This soothing gel helps reduce discomfort after a long day outside without leaving skin feeling tight or dry, and it can help calm areas of irritation.

The sea-toned packaging references the key ingredient: azulene, traditionally derived from chamomile flowers. It supports antibacterial care and skin renewal while helping maintain the hydrolipid balance.

The cleanser works on multiple goals:
- removing makeup and sebum
- supporting the skin barrier
- calming irritation and visible inflammation
- helping even the look of skin tone

Its main focus is to maintain an optimal acid mantle balance. With a pH around 5.5–6.5, it’s designed to be gentle for sensitive, irritated skin.

Key ingredients: Ceramide Complex; Peptide Complex; 3 Types of Hyaluronic Acid; Guaiazulene; Lactic Acid; Mint Extract

how_to_use: Mix the needed amount with water to create a rich foam. Massage gently over the face and rinse with warm or cool water.

name: Double Vita Capsule Cleansing Foam
text:
Neogen — Double Vita Capsule Cleansing Foam

A gentle cleansing foam with a mild exfoliating effect and yuzu extract from Jeju Island. It helps cleanse pores and remove dead skin cells, leaving skin smoother and more radiant.

The foam contains capsules with AHA enzyme and a patented ingredient complex (TRANEXIN NIA C) designed to support gentle exfoliation and healthier-looking skin. The multi-layer liposome component (tranexamic acid + niacinamide + vitamin C) helps brighten and visually even tone.

The gel texture provides delicate cleansing and hydration while supporting a healthy skin pH. The dual capsules help refresh the skin and remove excess sebum along with impurities.

Enriched with multiple vitamins, several forms of hyaluronic acid, and citrus extracts, it aims to cleanse without over-drying, supporting moisture retention and a fresher look.

Suitable for all skin types. If you have sensitive skin, patch-test (inner elbow or a small area of the neck) before use.

Key ingredients: Glutathione; Yuzu Extract; Lemon Extract; AHA; PHA; Papaya Juice / Papain; BHA

name: Flavon Serum
text:
Botanity — Flavon Serum

This serum creates an invisible barrier between your skin and harsh urban environmental stressors. It is especially recommended for thin, sensitive skin prone to redness and visible capillaries (couperose/rosacea-prone skin). The serum has a rich herbal scent. Calm your skin — and it will thank you.

name: Daily Moisture Bubble Toner
text:
ilso — Daily Moisture Bubble Toner

This hydrating toner quickly restores the skin’s moisture balance and helps maintain it throughout the day. It works like a booster: it helps actives from subsequent products absorb faster and perform better, supporting deeper delivery into the skin.

The effect comes from an unusual formula — the toner lightly foams when you shake the bottle. The foam helps oxygenate the skin and can enhance product penetration.

The lightweight, water-based texture pairs well with retinol, vitamin C, niacinamide, acids, and peptides. It tones the skin and addresses dehydration signs, reducing flaking and tightness and helping prevent dehydration lines.

For best results, apply in multiple layers. With a neutral pH of 5.0–6.5, it is gentle and suitable for dry, normal, and sensitive skin, helping calm redness.

Key ingredients: Ectoin; Hyaluronic Acid; Camellia Flower Extract; Birch Sap; Trehalose

Composition/INCI: Ethylhexylglycerin, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Disodium EDTA, Trehalose, Betaine, Coconut Water, Birch Sap, Sodium Hyaluronate, Polyglyceryl-10 Myristate, Carbomer, Butylene Glycol, Glyceryl Acrylate/Acrylic Acid Copolymer, Allantoin, Propanediol, Aloe Vera Leaf Water, Xanthan Gum, Sea Buckthorn Water, Camellia Flower Extract, 1,2-Hexanediol, Polyglutamic Acid, Water, Arginine, Glycerin, Ectoin

text:
WONJIN — Effect Power Rejuvenation Mask

This mask helps visibly smooth skin and soften the look of wrinkles, suitable for all skin types — without injections.

It is a gentle alternative powered by a blend of effective, rare natural components.

name: Vitamin A Mask
text:
BRTC — Vitamin A Mask

A rejuvenating sheet mask with vitamin A and beta-glucan helps smooth fine lines and improve skin firmness. The vitamin A source comes from natural extracts such as carrot, pumpkin, and more.

Key ingredients: Lycopene; Adenosine; Beta-Glucan; Vitamin A

name: Truffle Firming Serum
text:
Jenny House — Truffle Firming Serum

Another black truffle product — this time a serum. Claims and user testing suggest the skin can feel firmer within a few hours after application, an effect previously associated mostly with in-clinic treatments.

The serum is rich in beta-glucan — a natural immunomodulator that helps support the skin’s immune defenses and provides strong anti-inflammatory and anti-aging benefits.

name: Glow Face Moisture Mask
text:
LALARECIPE — Glow Face Moisture Mask

LALARECIPE aims to break the stereotype that wearing a mask looks unattractive. That’s why the hydrogel material is decorated with colorful, shimmering stars for a touch of magic.

The results are more science than fantasy: 88% of the formula is naturally derived, delivering gentle care — hydration, cooling, and a mild firming effect.

The hydrogel adheres closely to the skin, helping support firmness and elasticity while restoring a youthful look. The cooling sensation can help calm irritated skin and reduce the look of inflammation. The brand cites testing showing skin temperature can drop by about 2°C during use.

The formula is free from animal-derived ingredients, sulfates, mineral oils, and gluten, and it is not tested on animals. Suitable for all skin types.

name: SOUL VEGAN LIP BALM (MAUVE)
text:
LAKA — SOUL VEGAN LIP BALM (MAUVE)

The creators position this lip tint as unisex, but we would be cautious with that claim — you likely won’t want to share it with anyone.

It instantly makes lips feel velvety and soft while helping the pigment develop, enhancing the natural lip tone. It can replace a classic lip balm.

It helps protect lips from wind and reduces the appearance of dryness, flakes, and rough patches. The melting texture works best when applied in layers: the more layers, the brighter the result.

You can also experiment by tapping it onto cheeks as blush or onto eyelids as a tint. It’s a vegan product — no animal testing and no animal-derived ingredients. The packaging is paper-only (no polyethylene), so a small amount of paper dust may appear when first opened.

Key ingredients: Sunflower Seed Oil; Blueberry Extract; Blue Water Lily Extract/Water

Composition/INCI: Lithol Rubine B (CI 15850), Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Octyldodecanol, Litsea Cubeba Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Blueberry Extract, Polyglyceryl-6 Polyricinoleate, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Polyglyceryl-2 Isostearate/Dimer Dilinoleate Copolymer, Limonene, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Raspberry Fruit Extract, Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Phytosteryl/Isostearyl/Cetyl/Stearyl/Behenyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Ultramarines (CI 77007), Castor Oil, Strawberry Fruit Extract, Polyethylene, Morus Alba Root Extract, Mandarin Peel Oil, Red Pigment (Lithol Rubine), Butylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Candelilla Wax, Dehydroacetic Acid, Water, Sorbitan Olivate, Sweet Orange Oil, Blue Water Lily Flower Water (Hydrosol), Ceresin, Diisostearyl Malate, Sunflower Seed Oil, Citral, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Microcrystalline Wax

name: Pure & Deep Cleansing Foam
text:
Ma:nyo — Pure & Deep Cleansing Foam

This gentle-looking foam cleanser cleans deeply and thoroughly. With regular use, pores and blackheads can appear reduced. Importantly, it aims to leave skin feeling comfortable after cleansing thanks to hyaluronic acid in the formula.

name: Madagascar Centella Probio-Cica Enrich Cream
text:
SKIN1004 — Madagascar Centella Probio-Cica Enrich Cream

A rich yet lightweight nourishing cream that combines key Korean skincare trends. Centella and probiotics help support the protective barrier, restore balance, and strengthen the skin’s defenses.

It provides a soothing effect, helps support a healthier skin microbiome, and delivers anti-aging support while softening rough skin.

The formula uses lamellar structures similar to skin lipids. Instead of oils simply being dispersed in water, lipids form thin layers within the cream. When applied, these components integrate into the epidermis like “patches,” helping reinforce compromised areas.

Non-comedogenic, with a silky finish (no greasy film). Suitable for all skin types, especially recommended for dry, problem-prone, and dehydrated skin.

Key ingredients: Macadamia Seed Oil; Shea Butter; Centella Asiatica; Lactobacillus/Centella Ferment; Ceramide NP

name: Altum Peptide Solution Cream
text:
IDENEL — Altum Peptide Solution Cream

A targeted anti-aging cream with peptide micro-needles — a SOS product that can be used within a routine (at the serum step) or on its own. Apply to areas that need extra support: under the eyes, between the brows, and nasolabial folds. The massage rollers make application easy and hygienic.

IDENEL’s research team developed the Altum® technology after 15 years of intensive work to help deliver components through the multilayer skin barrier.

This targeted cream aims to restore elasticity and firmness, strengthen the skin’s protective functions, provide a lifting effect, reduce redness, and help fade the look of pigmentation.

The described mechanism: the micro-needle peptide penetrates deeply → separates and releases upon interacting with glutathione-related activity → stimulates fibroblasts → supports collagen formation → collagen improves elasticity and firmness.

Altum® means “deep” in Latin. The brand reports faster absorption versus conventional peptides and provides clinical claim figures for improvements in wrinkles, firmness, density, hydration, and texture with regular use.

Key ingredients: Allantoin; Adenosine; Madecassoside; Niacinamide

Composition/INCI: Tocopherol, Sorbitan Olivate, Madecassoside, Cetearyl Olivate, Cetearyl Glucoside, Arachidyl Alcohol, Propylheptyl Caprylate, Propanediol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Betaine, Silica Polysilsesquioxane Propyldisulfideacetyl Tripeptide-84, Glucose, Panthenol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Pentaerythrityl Distearate, Water, Lecithin, Adenosine, Allantoin, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Arachidyl Glucoside, Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose Distearate, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Glyceryl Caprylate, Disodium EDTA, Ethylhexylglycerin, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Dimethicone, Behenyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Sodium Acrylates Copolymer, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Hydrogenated Poly(C6-14 Olefin)

name: Ultimate Revival Eye Cream
text:
G2Cell — Ultimate Revival Eye Cream

G2Cell is built around a scientific approach, focusing on genetic research into skin aging and the impact of external factors.

The Ultimate Revival Cream aims to deliver results comparable to in-clinic procedures — without injections: it targets visible signs of aging, supports denser-looking skin, and helps protect against environmental stressors. Light-reflecting particles help make dark circles look less noticeable. The formula includes a mix of botanical extracts and signature ingredients such as argireline, lycopene, and glutathione.

name: Flavon Booster
text:
Botanity — Flavon Booster

A simple routine option for those who don’t like layering many products each evening: cleanse, apply this toner-booster, then finish with your favorite cream or sleeping mask. Ultimately, what matters most is going to bed feeling comfortable — and waking up to skin that looks fresh and cared for.

Composition/INCI: Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Polyglyceryl-10 Oleate, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Bergamot Oil, Diphenyl Dimethicone, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Dipropylene Glycol, Gluconolactone, Betaine, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Hyaluronate, Polyglyceryl-10 Myristate, Butylene Glycol, Scutellaria Baicalensis Extract, Hyaluronic Acid, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hyaluronate, Lavender Oil, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Basil Oil, Eucalyptus Oil, Allantoin, Limonene, Ethylhexylglycerin, Xanthan Gum, Sucrose Palmitate, Arginine, 1,2-Hexanediol, Aloe Leaf Extract, Water, Bamboo Extract, Carbomer, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Tromethamine, Glycerin, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid

name: Dokdo Hydration Water Gel Mask
text:
ROUND LAB — Dokdo Hydration Water Gel Mask

The hero ingredient, as in the toner, is the patented Hatching EX07 complex sourced from pristine deep-sea waters near Ulleungdo Island. This mineral-rich water helps restore the skin’s water–lipid balance and contains 74 types of minerals preserved via a specialized nanofiltration membrane technology.

The mask also includes multiple types of hyaluronic acid and amino acids that help support hydration and reduce transepidermal water loss.

A quick hydrating effect is reported as clinically confirmed. The unique gel texture helps calm irritated skin and cool it.

The sheet is made from an eco-friendly biodegradable material.
