name: Calamine Derma Secret Mask
text:
K-Secret — Calamine Derma Secret Mask

A pink mask with naturally derived ingredients designed to soothe skin irritated by external factors. Thanks to calamine’s calming, anti-inflammatory properties, it helps target breakouts and smooth texture while supporting a more even-looking tone. Zinc oxide in the calamine component is also associated with a tightening feel and pore-care benefits.

The essence has a matte finish and does not feel sticky. Ideal when you need to:
- hydrate quickly with minimal effort;
- wake up to a more even-looking tone;
- calm inflammation from environmental stress.

Calamine is a naturally occurring mineral used widely for soothing skin, and it is generally considered safe even during pregnancy and breastfeeding.

Key ingredients: Niacinamide (Vitamin B3); Hyaluronic Acid; Calamine; Fermented Soybean Extract

Composition/INCI: Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract, Pinus Sylvestris Leaf Extract, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Chlorphenesin, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, 1,2-Hexanediol, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Solanum Melongena (Eggplant) Fruit Extract, Panthenol, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract, Melia Azadirachta Flower Extract, Cellulose Gum, Cinnamomum Cassia Bark Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Flower Extract, Allantoin, Origanum Vulgare Leaf Extract, Chamaecyparis Obtusa Leaf Extract, Salix Alba (Willow) Bark Extract, Calamine, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Ocimum Sanctum Leaf Extract, Butylene Glycol, Potassium Hyaluronate, Caprylyl Glycol, PEG-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hyaluronic Acid, Disodium EDTA, Lactobacillus/Soybean Ferment Extract, Ethylhexylglycerin, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract, Pentylene Glycol, Propanediol, Coccinia Indica Fruit Extract, Corallina Officinalis Extract, Water, Glycerin, Arginine, Xanthan Gum, Niacinamide, Portulaca Oleracea Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Fragrance, Carbomer, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate
how_to_use: After cleansing and toning, apply the mask evenly to the face. Leave on for 10–20 minutes, remove, and pat in the remaining essence. Single use.

name: Hyalu-Cica Water-Fit Sun Serum SPF50+ PA++++

actives.name: UV Filters (Ethylhexyl Triazone, Diethylamino Hydroxybenzoyl Hexyl Benzoate, Diethylhexyl Butamido Triazone)

text:
SKIN1004 — Hyalu-Cica Water-Fit Sun Serum SPF50+ PA++++

We consider SPF a year-round essential. Even when the sun is less intense in autumn and winter, UV exposure can still contribute to pigmentation, inflammation, and accelerated photoaging.

This sunscreen-serum is comfortable to apply, with a lightweight, non-sticky texture.

It offers high protection and is designed to be long-wearing (more resistant to sweat, friction, and incidental water exposure). It also provides skincare benefits, so in some routines it can double as a moisturizing step. With hyaluronic acid, it helps support hydration and reduce dryness.

Key ingredients: Hyaluronic Acid; Niacinamide; Centella Asiatica

Composition/INCI: Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Niacinamide, Ginkgo Biloba Leaf Extract, Hyaluronic Acid (0.01 ppm), Caprylyl Methicone, Behenyl Alcohol, Inositol, Wheat Germ Extract, Betula Alba (Birch) Bark Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Broccoli Sprout Extract, t-Butyl Alcohol, Tocopherol, Carbomer, Ethylhexyl Triazone, Centella Asiatica Extract (9800 ppm), Diethylhexyl Butamido Triazone, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Decyl Glucoside, Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose Distearate, Adenosine, Rocket Leaf Extract, Camellia Japonica Leaf Extract, Propanediol, Diethylamino Hydroxybenzoyl Hexyl Benzoate, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Alfalfa Extract, Ethylhexylglycerin, Xanthan Gum, Butylene Glycol, Pentylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Water, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Sodium Hyaluronate (10 ppm), Tromethamine, C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate, Dibutyl Adipate, Glycerin, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid (1 ppm), Methylene Bis-Benzotriazolyl Tetramethylbutylphenol
how_to_use: As the final step of your morning routine, apply about 1.2 ml to the face, neck, and other exposed areas 15–20 minutes before going outside. Reapply every 2 hours during direct sun exposure (e.g., at the beach).

name: Marine Collagen Peptide Sticks
text:
Marine — Marine Collagen Peptide Sticks

Marine Peptide Collagen Sticks were developed for over two years to create a product designed to work not only through dosage, but through a well-structured formula.

The base is marine collagen peptides with an ultra-low molecular weight of 300 Da, intended for high absorption.

With regular intake, the brand positions the product as a comprehensive support formula for radiance, hair and nails, recovery after physical activity, joints and ligaments, and digestion/appetite balance.

The jelly format is intended to help stabilize collagen and allow the inclusion of supportive actives.

Key ingredients: Vitamins B1 and B3; Marine Collagen Peptides; Glutathione; Calcium Lactate; Hyaluronic Acid; Allulose; Elastin; Succinic Acid; Concentrated Mandarin Juice; L-Carnitine; Zinc

Composition/INCI: Allulose, Concentrated Mandarin Juice, Fish Collagen Peptides, Succinic Acid, Thickener/Gelling Agent Blend, Stevia, Hyaluronic Acid, Calcium Lactate, Flavorings, Triacetin, Glycerin, Ethanol, Propylene Glycol, Trisodium Citrate, Gamma-Cyclodextrin, Niacinamide (Vitamin B3), Zinc Oxide, Sucralose, Concentrated Acerola Juice, Thiamine Hydrochloride (Vitamin B1), Hydrolyzed Elastin, L-Carnitine, Yeast Extract, Purified Water
how_to_use: Directions: Take 1 stick per day. Best taken in the morning on an empty stomach; if you have a sensitive GI tract, you may take it after food. Use daily for noticeable results. Minimum course: 30 days; optimal: 3 months; can be used continuously. Contraindications: individual intolerance; fish/seafood allergy; acute GI conditions (gastritis/ulcer flare); tendency to diarrhea; during pregnancy/breastfeeding only after consulting a physician.

name: 4GF Eyelash Ampoule
text:
Ma:nyo — 4GF Eyelash Ampoule

You don’t have to go far for fuller brows and longer lashes. This ampoule serum supports regeneration in hair follicles, helps strengthen hairs, adds volume and softness, and hydrates the skin.

A high concentration of the 4GF growth factor complex is designed to support stronger hair structure and encourage growth with daily use.

The lightweight, non-oily texture feels comfortable around the eyes and does not leave a film. The formula is positioned as hypoallergenic and suitable even for sensitive eyes. Use on both lashes and brows to help protect from dryness and breakage while improving shine.

Composition/INCI: Glyceryl Caprylate, Sh-Oligopeptide-1, Sh-Polypeptide-2, Niacinamide, Ethylhexylglycerin, Beta-Glucan, Trehalose, Behenyl Alcohol, Betaine, Bifida Ferment Lysate, Panthenol, Lime Hydrosol, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrogenated Olive Oil Unsaponifiables, Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, Lactobacillus-Fermented Pumpkin Fruit Filtrate, Malus Domestica (Apple) Fruit Extract, Arachidyl Glucoside, Quinoa Extract, Squalane, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil, Sea Buckthorn Hydrosol, Calendula Officinalis Hydrosol, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Adenosine, Morus Alba Bark Extract, Rose Hydrosol, Propanediol Dicaprylate, Propanediol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Evening Primrose Oil, Cetearyl Olivate, Arachidyl Alcohol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Water, Cetearyl Alcohol, Portulaca Oleracea Extract, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Acai Fruit Extract, Sh-Oligopeptide-2, Sorbitan Olivate, Wheat Germ Protein, Propylene Glycol Dicaprylate, Glycerin, Wild Carrot Root Extract, Sh-Polypeptide-1, Padina Pavonica Extract, Sophora Flavescens Root Extract, Cetearyl Glucoside, Hydrolyzed Collagen Extract
how_to_use: Patch-test first. Apply the needed amount to lashes and brows with the brush, coating hairs thoroughly. Use daily. If it gets into the eyes, rinse immediately with water. Discontinue if irritation occurs and consult a specialist if needed.

name: PT Toner
text:
Cos de BAHA — PT Toner

A comfort-focused toner with a thicker-than-usual texture, yet oil-free. It tones the skin, contains no alcohol, and centers on peptides that support collagen and elastin production. After this toner, a cream is often recommended — but this formula can also feel sufficient on its own.

Composition/INCI: Matrixyl 3000 (Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7), Melissa Officinalis Extract, Beta-Glucan, Betaine, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8 (Argireline), Sodium Hyaluronate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Rosa Damascena Extract, Artemisia Vulgaris Extract, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower Extract, Adenosine, Allantoin, Propanediol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Glycerin
how_to_use: Apply to cleansed skin with a cotton pad or hands, patting until fully absorbed. For a plump, well-hydrated feel, apply in multiple layers.

name: Glutathione Mist Ampoule
text:
Dermafirm — Glutathione Mist Ampoule

A novel format in at-home care: a mist-ampoule inspired by skincare procedures popular among Korean celebrities. It targets hyperpigmentation and dark spots and delivers quick hydration and nourishment.

The brand describes a three-step approach:
1) Antioxidant activity
2) Anti-glycation
3) Reduced melanin synthesis → less dullness + more even tone

The line is positioned for rough, dull skin weakened by environmental stressors. It supports the skin’s protective function, brightens, firms, and helps smooth multiple types of wrinkles.

Because glutathione is a larger molecule, the brand developed Glutathione Nano Brightening™ to help deliver it more effectively. Claims reference increased penetration and faster absorption.

Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive and acne-prone.

Key ingredients: Glutathione; Vitamin E; Vitamin C

Composition/INCI: Tocopherol, Hydroxyethyl Urea, Propanediol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Betaine, Glutathione, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Phytosteryl/Octyldodecyl Lauroyl Glutamate, Dipropylene Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Ascorbic Acid, Water, Trehalose, Adenosine, Perilla Ocymoides Leaf Extract, Ceramide NP, Allantoin, Butylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Disodium EDTA, C12-14 Pareth-12, Glycerin, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Extract, Niacinamide, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Phosphatidylcholine, Fragrance
how_to_use: Spray evenly over the face 1–5 times from 10–20 cm away with eyes closed. Pat gently to absorb. Use as the first and/or last step of skincare.

name: Tea Tree Acne Daily Wash

actives.name: Tea Tree Leaf Extract / Tea Tree Oil

text:
Essenherb — Tea Tree Acne Daily Wash

A body wash with tea tree designed to help address body breakouts, providing a fresh feel while helping keep skin smooth and comfortable. It has a sanitizing/purifying focus and an optimal pH around 5.5 that can suit even sensitive skin.

A herbal complex helps calm irritation and reduce the likelihood of inflammation by supporting sebum balance. Acids in the formula support cell turnover, help clear pores, and remove dead skin buildup.

The gel contains two patented complexes:
- Herbal AC Cure Complex™ (calming and redness-reducing support)
- 5-Phyto Active Complex™ (a blend of plant extracts with nourishing, hydrating, and antioxidant properties)

Vegan-certified (no animal-derived ingredients). Suitable for daily use, especially recommended for oily, combination, and blemish-prone skin.

Key ingredients: Salicylic Acid; Menthol; Tea Tree Leaf Extract; Lactic Acid (AHA); Lavender Oil

Composition/INCI: Lactic Acid, Acerola Cherry Fruit Extract, Peppermint Oil, Tea Tree Leaf Extract (40,000 ppm), Hydrogenated Lecithin, Disodium EDTA, Cocamide Methyl MEA, Salicylic Acid, Polyquaternium-22, Tea Tree Leaf Oil (500 ppm), Panthenol, Limonene, Camu Camu Fruit Extract, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hexylene Glycol, Bamboo Hydrosol, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Linalool, Lavender Oil, Ceramide NP, Citric Acid, Chinese Mint Leaf Oil, Menthol, Butylene Glycol, Pine Leaf Oil, Fig Extract, 1,2-Hexanediol, Aloe Leaf Extract, Water, Coco-Glucoside, Sodium Chloride, C12-14 Pareth-12, Green Tea Leaf Extract, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Centella Asiatica Extract, Glycerin, Disodium Laureth Sulfosuccinate, Citral
how_to_use: Apply a small amount to hands or a loofah, lather with water, massage over the skin, and rinse with warm water.

name: Mild Cleansing Gel
text:
NEEDLY — Mild Cleansing Gel

A real find for sensitive, acne-prone skin. Without stripping moisture or leaving tightness, this cleanser gently removes impurities and dust particles. It also cleanses the skin softly yet effectively, including removing traces of SPF.

Its mild pH 6.0 ± 0.5 formula matches the skin’s natural acidity and helps soften the epidermis, leaving skin velvety-smooth.

The product has passed clinical testing, including dermatological and irritation tests. It contains no synthetic colorants or fragrances.

How to use: Lather a small amount in your palms, then massage onto the skin, focusing on problem areas for 20–30 seconds. Rinse with warm water. If needed, it can also be used to cleanse acne-prone body skin.

Key ingredients: Caprylyl Glycol; Quillaja Bark Extract; Glycerin; Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate

Composition/INCI: Fragrance, 1,2-Diol, Salicylic Acid, Fragrance, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Quillaja Bark Extract, Potassium Cocoyl Glutamate, Sodium Phytate, Butylene Glycol, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Citric Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Citrate, Potassium Laureth Sulfosuccinate, Linalool, Coco-Glucoside, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Water, Glycerin
how_to_use: Lather a small amount in your palms, then massage onto the skin, focusing on problem areas for 20–30 seconds. Rinse with warm water. If needed, use it to cleanse acne-prone body skin as well.

name: Calamine 30 Days Secret Toner
text:
K-SECRET — Calamine 30 Days Secret Toner

To maximize the benefits of nourishing creams and improve the skin’s absorption, toners are essential. They act as a “conductor,” helping restore the skin’s hydrolipid balance and enhancing the effect of the next steps—creams, serums, and masks.

This K-Secret toner with calamine powder has anti-inflammatory properties and supports the fight against acne and oily shine. It helps reduce breakouts and irritation while cleansing deeply and maintaining the hydrolipid balance. This effect comes from a strong blend of hydrating, antioxidant, and soothing components.

Thanks to amine oxide in the formula, the toner helps tighten the look of pores and discourages the growth of bacteria associated with milia (“white bumps”). Calamine (30,000 ppm) helps regulate sebum and works gently with inflammation. Suitable for all skin types, but especially recommended for oily, combination, and problem-prone skin.

Key ingredients: Lactobacillus-fermented Soybean Extract; Witch Hazel Extract; Centella Asiatica Extract; Portulaca Extract

Composition/INCI: Hamamelis Virginiana Extract, Niacinamide, 2-Hexanediol, Thyme Extract, Dipropylene Glycol, PPG-26-Buteth-26, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Caprylyl Glycol, Calamine (30,000 ppm), Fragrance, Lactobacillus Ferment Soybean Extract, Chamaecyparis Obtusa Leaf Extract, Origanum Vulgare Leaf Extract, Cinnamon Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Disodium EDTA, Portulaca Oleracea Extract, Butylene Glycol, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Bark/Leaf/Twig Extract, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Adenosine, Citric Acid, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Allantoin, Polygonum Cuspidatum Root Extract, Alcohol, Salix Alba (Willow) Bark Extract, Rosemary Extract, Aloe Leaf Extract, Water, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Lavender Extract, Centella Asiatica Extract, Glycerin
how_to_use: Shake the bottle well so the calamine powder sediment disperses. Soak a cotton pad and wipe over clean, dry skin from the center of the face outward. Let it absorb fully, then apply essence and/or moisturizer.

name: Hyaluronic Acid Toner
text:
IsNtree — Hyaluronic Acid Toner

In Korea, they believe truly hydrated skin is hard to achieve without a toner. That’s why this step appears in nearly every skincare box. Here is IsNtree’s bestseller toner—a new-generation formula based on three types of hyaluronic acid.

All IsNtree cosmetics are certified by the Korean Ministry of Food and Drug Safety, reflecting exceptionally high standards of production and raw material sourcing.

The idea is that a combination of hyaluronic acid molecules of different sizes quickly penetrates into the skin layers to hydrate and support elasticity.

Hydration is further enhanced by natural components in a patented complex: aloe juice and Althaea rosea (hollyhock) flower extract. Beyond hydration, this ingredient also has notable soothing, anti-inflammatory properties.

Its performance is supported by testing: during product development, the toner was shown to be hypoallergenic and non-irritating, and a study reported that after use, participants’ skin was 34% more hydrated compared to baseline.

Composition/INCI: Usnea Barbata (Lichen) Extract, Pulsatilla Koreana Extract, Panthenol, Soluble Collagen, Water, Trehalose, Zanthoxylum Piperitum Fruit Extract, Butylene Glycol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Althaea Rosea Flower Extract, Betula Alba Juice, Glycerin, Portulaca Oleracea Extract, Beta-Glucan
how_to_use: Soak a cotton pad and gently wipe over clean, dry facial skin. Let it absorb fully, then apply essence and/or moisturizer.

name: Echinacea Calming Moisture Mask
text:
Rawquest — Echinacea Calming Moisture Mask

A calming echinacea mask is true emergency beauty support. It refreshes with a light cooling effect that helps reduce minor puffiness and redness. The product improves the look of skin texture, makes pigmentation less noticeable, adds natural radiance, and helps bring back elasticity.

It supports the skin’s protective barrier, helping slow visible signs of aging while relieving dehydration and flaking.

The formula includes low-molecular-weight hyaluronic acid designed to penetrate deeper layers to support the hydrolipid balance from within. Ceramides add nourishment and protection.

The sheet is made from a hypoallergenic blend of Tencel, cotton, and skin-friendly materials suitable even for sensitive skin. It works well for dull, loss-of-firmness skin with early aging signs, and also for problem-prone skin with a weakened barrier and a tendency to inflammation.

Key ingredients: Madecassoside; Allantoin; Echinacea Extract; Niacinamide; Hyaluronic Acid

Composition/INCI: Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Echinacea Purpurea Extract (83.8%), Hydrogenated Polydecene, Hydroxyacetophenone, Niacinamide, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Disodium EDTA, Sucrose Distearate, Cocoa Extract, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Copolymer, Osmanthus Fragrans Flower Extract, Allantoin, Glycereth-26, Trideceth-10, Amyris Balsamifera Bark Oil, Squalane, Madecassoside, Chamomile Flower Extract, Portulaca Extract, Hyaluronic Acid, Adenosine, Dipotassium Phosphate, Coconut Oil, Hedera Helix (Ivy) Extract, Propanediol, Cellulose Gum, Banana Extract, Xanthan Gum, Strawberry Extract, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Butylene Glycol, Sodium Polyacryloyldimethyl Taurate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Water, Dipropylene Glycol, Fragaria Vesca (Strawberry) Leaf Extract, Vinyl Dimethicone, Acetyl Glutamine, Gardenia Florida Extract, Arginine, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Glycerin
how_to_use: After toner, apply the mask evenly to the face. Leave on for 10–20 minutes. Remove and gently pat the remaining essence into face and neck. Single-use. Patch test on the inner elbow or a small area of the neck before first use.

name: Wild Brow Shaper
text:
Laka — Wild Brow Shaper

Tom Ford once said, “Brows are the most important part of a beautiful face.” We agree: the right shape makes the gaze more expressive. Laka’s brow gel tames unruly brows by lifting and holding each hair from root to tip.

Its clear formula suits any brow shade, adds shine and a groomed look, and the удобная brush helps shape and set the brows. The gel does not flake, does not glue hairs together, and does not form clumps, picking up only the amount needed.

Composition/INCI: Aminomethylpropanol, Panthenol, Polyvinylpyrrolidone, Polyvinylpyrrolidone/Vinyl Acetate Copolymer, Carbomer, Disodium EDTA, Alcohol, Butylene Glycol, Water, Phenoxyethanol, Polyvinyl Alcohol
how_to_use: Using the brush, apply the gel to the brows in the direction of hair growth, shaping them as desired.

name: Water Wash Balm
text:
Juice to Cleanse — Water Wash Balm

If you like minimalism and mindful consumption—saving both space and budget by using one jar instead of 2–3—Juice to Cleanse sorbet balm is a great choice.

A winner of multiple Asian beauty awards and the international Allure 2020 award, this gentle balm with a fresh scent performs several functions:

1) Removes light and long-wear makeup
2) Gently cleanses before skincare
3) Lightly exfoliates dead skin cells
4) Supports skin renewal
5) A unique transforming texture: a sorbet melts into an airy cream on warm skin, dissolving even heavy makeup and SPF.

When it meets water, it turns into a мягкая foam, removing остатки impurities. If you pre-lather it in your hands, it becomes a convenient cleanser with a густая, gentle texture. Oils and glycerin help prevent tightness and dryness after use.

The brand is known for its extraction technology: exotic fruit extracts are obtained via cold pressing at 4°C—almost like freshly squeezed juice—helping preserve properties and avoid unnecessary substances.

Key ingredients: Pineapple Extract; Papaya Extract; Lemon/Lime/Mango Extract Blend

Composition/INCI: Corallina Extract, Chlorphenesin, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Curcuma Root Extract, Jasmine Flower Extract, Disodium EDTA, Linalool, Sodium Stearate, Glyceryl Stearate, Dipropylene Glycol, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Oil, Sodium Isethionate, Limonene, Orange Oil, Stearic Acid, Polyglyceryl-10 Myristate, Tea Tree Leaf Oil, Camphor Oil, Butylene Glycol, Lavender Oil, Mango Juice, Citric Acid, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Caprylyl Glycol, Allantoin, Pineapple Juice, Lemon Fruit Extract, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Sodium Citrate, Papaya Juice, Lime Juice, 1,2-Hexanediol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Water, Coco-Glucoside, Neem Leaf Extract, Pelargonium Flower Oil, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Glycerin, Hydrogenated Coconut Acid, Basil Leaf Extract
how_to_use: Massage a small amount onto dry skin to dissolve makeup. Add water to create foam, cleanse, and rinse. As a morning cleanser: lather a small amount in hands with a little water and cleanse as usual. Avoid the eye area; if product gets into eyes, rinse immediately with water.

name: V.Collagen Heart Fit Ampoule
text:
Ma:nyo — V.Collagen Heart Fit Ampoule

A firming ampoule from Ma:nyo with plant-based collagen designed to support faster skin renewal. A synergistic blend helps improve elasticity, supports collagen and elastin synthesis, and brings back a healthy-looking complexion.

It targets visible signs of aging and, despite its light texture, nourishes deeply and supports protective functions. The serum is known for its liposomal formula designed for fast, комфортное absorption into deeper layers.

The brand emphasizes ethical косметика: this serum has a vegan certificate (no animal-derived ingredients) and certification confirming it is not tested on animals.

Suitable for all skin types, especially recommended for dry and dull skin with early or noticeable signs of aging. For sensitive skin, a patch test on the inner elbow or a small area of the neck is recommended.

Key ingredients: Damask Rose Oil; Snow Mushroom Phyto-Collagen; Collagener; Plant Collagen

Composition/INCI: Glyceryl Acrylate/Acrylic Acid Copolymer, Lauryl Tetraethoxyphosphate (Trilaureth-4 Phosphate), Pentylene Glycol, Collagen Extract (53.9%), Niacinamide, Ethylhexylglycerin, Caramel, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/Vinyl Pyrrolidone Copolymer, Linalool, Rosa Damascena Flower Water, Geranium Essential Oil, Betaine, Geraniol, Tocopherol, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Sorbitan Oleate, Glycereth-26, C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Carbomer, Polyglycerin-3, Disodium EDTA, Citronellol, Butylene Glycol, Adenosine, Collagen (900 ppm), Polyglyceryl-3 Distearate, Xanthan Gum, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Ethylhexyl Stearate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Rosa Damascena Flower Oil, 1,2-Hexanediol, Water, Sodium Hydroxide, Glycerin, Propanediol, Lupinus Albus Seed Extract, Tromethamine, Tremella Fuciformis Extract, Lecithin
how_to_use: Apply 2–3 drops to clean face and neck after toner. Let absorb, then finish with a cream.

name: Super Glutathione 100 Bright Mask
text:
SUR.MEDIC+ — Super Glutathione 100 Bright Mask

A glutathione mask designed to help skin look smoother and more radiant. It brightens, supports elasticity, boosts luminosity, and provides immediate hydration after application. Thanks to a high concentration of glutathione, skin appears less dull and certain types of pigmentation (such as melasma and freckles) look reduced.

The formula is built around Triple Micro Fit Sheet technology with three special layers that help nutrients penetrate deeper, prevent moisture loss, and support интенсивное brightening.

With antioxidant benefits, it helps protect the skin from free radicals, reduces visible redness, and supports a more even tone. Suitable for all skin types and conditions, including sensitive and dehydrated skin.

Key ingredients: Panthenol (Vitamin B5); Adenosine; Glutathione; Vitamin C; Niacinamide

Composition/INCI: Hydroxypropyl Cyclodextrin, Ethylhexylglycerin, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Propanediol, Glycereth-26, 1,2-Hexanediol, Betaine, Glutathione, Morus Alba Bark Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate, Panthenol, Bacillus Ferment, Dipropylene Glycol, Saussurea Involucrata Extract, Opuntia Coccinellifera Fruit Extract, Ascorbic Acid, Water, Trehalose, Camellia Japonica Seed Oil, Pearl Extract, Adenosine, Origanum Vulgare Leaf Extract, Salix Alba (Willow) Bark Extract, Butylene Glycol, PEG/PPG-17/6 Copolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Hydrolyzed Collagen, PEG-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Phenyl Trimethicone, Disodium EDTA, Lilium Tigrinum Extract, Tromethamine, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Jasminum Officinale (Jasmine) Flower Extract, Glycerin, Xanthan Gum, Niacinamide, Portulaca Oleracea Extract, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Glyceryl Caprylate, Carbomer, Nelumbo Nucifera Flower Extract
how_to_use: Apply the mask to clean skin after toner. Leave on for 10–15 minutes, then remove and gently pat the remaining essence into face and neck. Single-use.

name: Hyper-Hydro Serum
text:
FEEV — Hyper-Hydro Serum

An ultra-hydrating face serum with an instant cooling effect, thanks to a light, fast-absorbing texture and a non-sticky finish. A perfect match for dehydrated skin: it works both for dry winter skin and oily summer skin.

Barrier strengthening and soothing benefits are supported by birch sap extract in the formula. Low-molecular-weight hyaluronic acid helps deliver deep hydration without provoking facial redness.

Clinical testing conducted at a skin research center in 2021 confirmed the absence of animal-derived ingredients and synthetic fragrances, and supported suitability for sensitive skin.

Key ingredients: Xylitol; Betulin; Niacinamide; Five Ceramides + Panthenol

Composition/INCI: Polyglyceryl-6 Caprylate, Phytosphingosine, Allantoin, Ceramide EOP, Niacinamide, Alcohol, Disodium EDTA, Betulin, Sodium Methyl Stearoyl Taurate, Panthenol, Ceramide AP, Ceramide NP, Tocopherol, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Eggplant Fruit Extract, Ceramide AS, Polyglycerin-3, Butylene Glycol, Xylitol, Melia Leaf Extract, Polyglyceryl-4 Caprate, Caprylyl Glycol, Ceramide NS, Coccinia Extract, Propanediol, Biosaccharide Gum-1, Ethylhexylglycerin, Melia Flower Extract, Sodium Polyacrylate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Aloe Leaf Extract, Water, Glyceryl Glucoside, Glycerin, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid
how_to_use: Apply 2–3 drops to clean face and neck after toner and let absorb. Finish with a cream. Use morning and evening. Works well as a makeup base.

name: Hyaluronic Acid Cleansing Foam
text:
IsNtree — Hyaluronic Acid Cleansing Foam

A great cleanser should feel pleasant, cleanse effectively, and not leave skin dry or tight—while also solving extra skincare needs. IsNtree’s cleansing foam fits these requirements. With 8 types of hyaluronic acid and 17 amino acids, it helps support hydration and the skin barrier, leaving skin smoother and softer. Its pH is close to healthy skin’s natural acidity, helping reduce dryness. Add it to your daily routine and the отопительный season will be easier on your skin.

How to use:
Lather a small amount in your hands and massage onto the face. Rinse thoroughly with warm water.

Key ingredients: 8 types of Hyaluronic Acid; 17 Amino Acids
