how_to_use: Lather a small amount in your palms and massage onto the face. Rinse thoroughly with warm water.

name: Zero Fit Cover Capsule Foundation
text:
LIZDA — Zero Fit Cover Capsule Foundation

After you’ve finished laughing at the product name, here’s what it actually is: one of the most weightless foundations out there. Its light texture helps prevent the formula from settling into pores and fine lines.

An innovative technology was designed specifically for those who dislike heavy coverage and a “mask” effect: the formula is 80% essence based on six types of hyaluronic acid, while the tint particles are encapsulated and release upon contact with skin, helping even out the complexion.

No brushes or sponges are required—clean hands are enough. The result is a natural, even tone with a velvety finish. The shade adapts to your skin tone, and even a light tan won’t ruin the match.

Composition/INCI: Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Andrographis Paniculata Leaf Extract, Hydrogenated Polydecene, Ethylhexylglycerin, Yellow Iron Oxide, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Dimethicone, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Purified Water, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Anemarrhena Asphodeloides Extract, Black Iron Oxide, Propylene Carbonate, Red Iron Oxide, Butylene Glycol, Hyaluronic Acid, Talc, Titanium Dioxide, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Propanediol, Glycosaminoglycan, Methyl Gluceth-20, Disteardimonium Hectorite, 1,2-Hexanediol, Cyclopentasiloxane, Sodium Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Tromethamine, Glycerin, Raspberry Ketone
how_to_use: Apply with clean hands (no brush or sponge needed). Build coverage to the desired finish; the shade adapts to the skin tone for a natural, velvety result.

name: Wonder Honey Green Aqua Bomb
text:
Haru Haru — Wonder Honey Green Aqua Bomb

HaruHaru is a brand created for modern women who are always busy and need simple solutions that genuinely work.

The products are 95% made of natural, безопасных ingredients (EWG rating: 0–2).

This lightweight gel-cream texture hydrates the skin and helps it recover. The base combines honey and green tea—both soothe the skin and support firmness—while hyaluronic acid saturates the skin with moisture and helps prevent transepidermal water loss.

Composition/INCI: Honey, Disodium EDTA, Cyclohexasiloxane, Betaine, Distilled Water, Fragrance, Tocopherol, Saccharomyces Ferment, Carbomer, CI 61565, Hyaluronic Acid, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Caprylyl Glycol, Propanediol, Xanthan Gum, 1,2-Hexanediol, Cyclopentasiloxane, Sclerotium Gum, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Tromethamine, Glycerin, Lactobacillus Ferment
how_to_use: Apply to clean skin after toner and serum as the final step in a daytime and/or evening routine.

name: Acala Microfiber Mask
text:
Be'Balance — Acala Microfiber Mask

A calming microfiber mask that helps reduce irritation and inflammation, supports a more youthful look, and strengthens barrier functions.

The formula includes aloe vera, known for helping the skin retain moisture even in extreme desert-like conditions. It instantly soothes irritated skin, hydrates intensely, improves elasticity, and supports a healthier, more lifted appearance.

The second key component is a ceramide complex. When ceramides are deficient, the skin barrier weakens: skin becomes dry and sensitive, loses moisture and elasticity. Ceramides make up up to 50% of the skin’s lipid layer, binding cells together and preventing moisture evaporation—playing a key role in maintaining a strong, healthy barrier.

Delivery is supported by liposomes—an advanced technology that helps active ingredients reach deeper epidermal layers, enhancing efficacy and prolonging effects.

How to use: After toner, apply the serum and let it absorb. Put on the mask for 10–20 minutes, remove, and pat the remaining essence into face and neck. Finish with cream. The set includes three components: serum, mask, and cream. Single-use mask.

Key ingredients: Ceramide Complex; Aloe Vera Leaf Extract; Patented Fruit Extract Complex

Composition/INCI: Histidine, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Isoleucine, Aloe Vera Leaf Juice, 1,2-Hexanediol, Bis-PEG-18 Methyl Ether Dimethyl Silane, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Propylene Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Triethanolamine, Lysine, Alanine, Ceramide NP, Allantoin, Cysteine, Butylene Glycol, Tyrosine, Methionine, Caprylyl Glycol, Purified Water, Leucine, PEG-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Pomegranate Extract, Disodium EDTA, Octyldodecanol, Glutamic Acid, Disodium EDTA, Ethylhexylglycerin, Threonine, Proline, Ginkgo Biloba Extract, Glycine, Mulberry Fruit Extract, Glycerin, Arginine, Xanthan Gum, Valine, Aspartic Acid, Fragrance, Phenylalanine, Carbomer, Fig Extract, Serine, Glyceryl Acrylate/Acrylic Acid Copolymer
how_to_use: After toner, apply the serum and let it absorb. Put on the mask for 10–20 minutes, remove it, then pat the remaining essence into face and neck. Finish with cream. The set includes serum, mask, and cream. Single-use mask.

name: Makiol Foaming Cleanser

actives.name: Tea Tree Extract + Green Tea Extract

text:
BOTANITY — Makiol Foaming Cleanser

Gentle daily cleansing without tightness. This soft foam helps regulate sebum and helps prevent pore clogging and unwanted shine via the patented Makiol C™ complex—a specialized blend of plant extracts developed in the brand’s own lab.

It also handles makeup, urban dust, and excess sebum effectively thanks to the 2X Forming System. The base includes hydrophilic and hydrophobic surfactants derived from coconut oil, allowing micro-foam to reach deep into pores.

LHA provides gentle exfoliation of dead skin cells. Tea tree and green tea extracts deliver a natural-support комплекс: tea tree offers antiseptic, бактерицидный support; green tea helps calm irritation and improve overall tone.

Sea buckthorn fruit extract softens, supports elasticity, and helps protect against free-radical damage associated with pollution, stress, smoking, and UV exposure.

How to use:
Dispense the required amount with the pump onto your palm. Massage over the entire face, then rinse with warm water.

Key ingredients: Sea Buckthorn Fruit Extract; Tea Tree & Green Tea Extracts; LHA

Composition/INCI: Lauramine Oxide, Capryloyl Salicylic Acid, Hydroxyacetophenone, Bergamot Oil, Disodium EDTA, Salicylic Acid, Gluconolactone, Lauramidopropyl Betaine, Tea Tree Extract, Rosemary Oil, Sunflower Extract, Sea Buckthorn Extract, Sorbeth-30 Tetraoleate, Camellia Extract, Chamaecyparis Extract, Linalool, Butylene Glycol, Lavender Oil, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Honokiol, Aloe Extract, Limonene, Japanese Mint Oil (Cornmint), Sodium Citrate, Lemon Balm Extract, 1,2-Hexanediol, Water, Coco-Glucoside, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Sodium Chloride, Mexican Juniper Oil, Tromethamine, Glycerin, Magnolol, Disodium Laureth Sulfosuccinate
how_to_use: Dispense the required amount with the pump onto your palm. Massage the foam over the entire face. Rinse with warm water.

name: MA Peptide Cream
text:
Cos De Baha — MA Peptide Cream

Peptide skincare is often described as “Botox without injections.” Many косметологи note that with long-term use, peptides can work in deeper layers to help smooth skin and reduce the appearance of aging.

If you are 25–30, you can use peptide products locally (between the brows, nasolabial folds, neck lines). For women 40+, a full peptide routine is often recommended.

Composition/INCI: Melissa Officinalis Extract, Cetearyl Olivate/Sorbitan Olivate, Hydrogenated Polydecene, Polysorbate 20, Niacinamide, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Argan Oil, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Polysorbate 60, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate/Glyceryl Stearate, Sorbitan Isostearate, Betaine, Panthenol, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Stearic Acid, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Rosa Damascena Extract, Squalane, Artemisia Vulgaris Extract, Lavandula Angustifolia Flower Extract, Allantoin, Propanediol, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, 1,2-Hexanediol, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cyclopentasiloxane, Carbomer, Adenosine, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Tocopheryl Acetate
how_to_use: Apply a small amount to clean, toned facial skin and spread gently until fully absorbed.

name: W.O.W Re:Booster O2 Caviar Serum
text:
Dr. MISIMOU — W.O.W Re:Booster O2 Caviar Serum

This serum has undeniable notes of luxury—black caviar extract is in the formula. Designed to support a youthful look, it works in multiple directions: helps reinforce the skin barrier, improves elasticity, and supports the appearance of smoother wrinkles.

It works in two stages: first, it enriches the skin with oxygen; then it replenishes nutrients and vitamins through caviar extract, helping the complexion look fresher and more rested.

An oxygen carrier forms airy capsules that burst on contact with skin, turning into foam. Light точечный massage helps the bubbles burst faster, allowing oxygen to penetrate deeper layers.

Black caviar is valued for supporting skin renewal and for strong hydration-related claims. By replenishing moisture loss, it helps deliver an optimal hydrating effect, plus antioxidant support that helps neutralize free radicals and slow visible aging.

The concentrated texture is designed to replace multiple routine steps: after cleansing and applying this serum, you can proceed directly to sunscreen and makeup. The product absorbs quickly and helps nourish the skin.

Key ingredients: Poly Lactic Acid; Peptide Complex; Royal Jelly; Centella Asiatica Extract; Niacinamide; 4-Butylresorcinol; Damask Rose Hydrosol; Jojoba Oil; Tremella Extract; Black Caviar Extract

Composition/INCI: Sh-Oligopeptide-1, Disiloxane, Niacinamide, Ethylhexyl Hydroxystearate Benzoate, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Disodium EDTA, Glycosphingolipids, Boswellia Extract, Polyglyceryl-6 Polyricinoleate, Betaine, Panthenol, Jojoba Seed Oil, Pine Extract, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Royal Jelly Powder, Hydrolyzed Corn Starch, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Dextrin, Rhus Chinensis Extract, Isopentyldiol, Poly-L-Lactic Acid, Decyl Glucoside, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Adenosine, Ceramide NP, Sh-Polypeptide-22, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Propanediol, 4-Butylresorcinol, Diethylhexyl Sebacate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Rosa Damascena Flower Water, Butylene Glycol, Sucrose, 1,2-Hexanediol, Water, Chrysanthemum Extract, Sh-Oligopeptide-2, Tremella Extract, Arginine, Black Caviar Extract, Centella Asiatica Extract, Glycerin, Rosa Roxburghii Fruit Extract, Sh-Polypeptide-1, Isopentane
how_to_use: Apply evenly to clean face and neck after toner. Once foam appears, let it settle, then massage with palms to distribute. Suitable for daily morning and/or evening use. Patch test on the inner elbow or a small neck area before first use.

name: H.C.T. Bubble Toner

actives.name: Tea Tree Extract + Green Tea Extract

text:
Mixsoon — H.C.T. Bubble Toner

Mixsoon focuses on simple but effective formulas built around minimalism and cleanliness: no unnecessary ingredients—only what is needed for gentle, effective care.

This foaming facial toner gently soothes, hydrates, and nourishes. Its weightless texture leaves a fresh, light feeling, and the mild composition is especially suitable for sensitive and problem-prone skin.

H.C.T. encodes the key ingredients: Houttuynia, Centella, Tea Tree. Together they act synergistically to help reduce irritation and inflammation and restore comfort.

At the heart are carefully selected plant extracts from Korea’s Jeju island. The formula uses a 48-hour low-temperature infusion method, where ingredients rest for 48 hours in a “breathing” barrel at low temperatures. The container is made of a special moisture-repelling material that allows air circulation.

For Centella extraction, the patented VegaLive™ process uses micro-bubbles to help preserve the plant’s beneficial properties.

The product is not tested on animals.

How to use: Apply to clean skin with gentle массажные movements.

Suitable for ежедневное use twice a day: morning and evening.

Key ingredients: Houttuynia Extract; Tea Tree & Green Tea Extracts; Centella Asiatica Extract

Composition/INCI: Tocopherol, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Water, Dipropylene Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Coco-Glucoside, Water, Houttuynia Cordata Extract (10,290 ppm), Decyl Glucoside, Caprylyl Glycol, Hydroxyacetophenone, Disodium EDTA, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Extract (10,290 ppm), Diglycerin, Polyglyceryl-4 Caprate, Glycerin, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Centella Asiatica Extract (10,185 ppm)
how_to_use: Apply to clean skin with gentle massaging motions. Suitable for daily use twice a day: morning and evening.

name: Yuzu Self Foaming 3-in-1 Peel Cleanser
text:
LALARECIPE — Yuzu Self Foaming 3-in-1 Peel Cleanser

We love multifunctional products that do several jobs while taking up far less space on the shelf. This мягкий gel based on Jeju yuzu citrus and 12 vitamins deeply cleanses pores, dissolves makeup, and gently exfoliates. Konjac particles and three acids—AHA, PHA, BHA—create the triple эффект.

Konjac gum helps exfoliate effectively, removing the keratinized layer along with water-resistant or evening makeup. The gel also helps with closed comedones by thoroughly cleansing pores and removing leftover dirt and dust. A high content of vitamins and niacinamide helps avoid over-drying; instead, it tones and supports a more even-looking complexion.

The product has a vegan certificate (no animal-derived ingredients). Suitable for all skin types. To avoid individual reactions, and for sensitive skin, a patch test is recommended.

Fun fact: natural ingredients can break down when heated during extraction. To prevent this, the formula uses a cold extraction method: yuzu is soaked in cold water for 24 hours, then gently filtered without pressure or chemical additives—slowly extracting beneficial components while preserving properties.

Key ingredients: Biotin (B7); Pyridoxine (B6); Ethyl Ascorbic Acid; Riboflavin (B2); Panthenol; Niacinamide; AHA; PHA; Tocopherol; BHA

Composition/INCI: Cyanocobalamin, Fragrance, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Niacinamide, Ethylhexylglycerin, Potassium Chloride, Tartrazine, Biotin, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Linalool, Linoleic Acid, Salicylic Acid, Lauryl Glucoside, Riboflavin, Sunset Yellow, Gluconolactone, Glycolic Acid, Panthenol, Limonene, Isopropyl Myristate, Hexylene Glycol, Tocopherol, Yuzu Extract (100 ppm), 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Disodium EDTA, Green Mandarin Peel Extract, Butylene Glycol, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Pyridoxine, Glucomannan, Folic Acid, Thiamine Hydrochloride, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Methyl Perfluorobutyl Ether, 1,2-Hexanediol, Potassium Cocoyl Glycinate, Water, Acrylate Copolymer, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Yuzu Seed Oil (100 ppm), Tromethamine, Glycerin, Formic Acid, Beta-Carotene
how_to_use: Apply a small amount to dry skin (can be over makeup), avoiding the eye area, and wait 10–15 seconds until foam forms. Gently massage to help bubbles burst. Add a little warm water and rinse, avoiding слизистые. Although positioned for daily use, we recommend 1–2 times per week because the acids and vitamin C are in active forms and cleansing is very deep. No extra cleanser or makeup remover is needed. Use SPF, as the formula contains acids and vitamin C.

name: Flavon Serum Mask
text:
Botanity — Flavon Serum Mask

This mask is a collaboration of two powerful ингредиенты. The first is the phytoestrogen “flavone,” extracted by scientists from herbs and plants. Phytoestrogens are natural antioxidants that support skin renewal and help increase collagen in deeper layers. The second ingredient is the timeless essential: hyaluronic acid. Together, they support your skin when it needs help most.

Composition/INCI: Ethylenediaminetetraacetic Acid (EDTA), Hydroxyacetophenone, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Bergamot Oil, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Linalool, Cocoa Extract, Beta-Glucan, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Centella Asiatica Extract, Dipropylene Glycol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Madecassic Acid, Methylpropanediol, Dextrin, Cetraria Islandica Extract, Madecassoside, Acrylate/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Scutellaria Baicalensis Extract, Potassium Hyaluronate, Hyaluronic Acid, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hyaluronate, Lavender Oil, Asiatic Acid, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Aloe Extract, Eclipta Leaf Extract, Limonene, Seaweed Extract, 1,2-Hexanediol, Water, Bamboo Extract, Fructooligosaccharide, Tromethamine, Glycerin
how_to_use: Use the mask after cleansing and toning. Apply to the face, distribute gently, and leave on for 15–20 minutes.

name: No Mercy Color Vibe Velvet, #101 Chillax
text:
Ma:nyo — No Mercy Color Vibe Velvet, #101 Chillax

A light texture and a velvety finish—what more could you want from a lipstick? It’s barely noticeable on the lips, and its longevity is impressive: drink coffee, snack, kiss loved ones—without worrying it will transfer to a cup, someone’s face, or your teeth.

The “tint” aspect means a soft stain remains by the end of the day even if you don’t reapply. The Velvet Cushioning and Soft Gel technologies help avoid a “dry season,” while the formula lets you create both a natural gradient look and a bold evening makeup. Apply a small amount as blush to complete the look.

Composition/INCI: Yellow Iron Oxide, Polyisobutene-1, Dimethicone, Caprylyl Methicone, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Fragrance, Methyl Trimethicone, Mica, Blue 1, Red 202, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Vinyl Dimethicone/Methicone Silsesquioxane Crosspolymer, Black Iron Oxide, Red 104, Tribehenin, Propylene Carbonate, Isododecane, Red Iron Oxide, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Titanium Dioxide, Phenoxyethanol, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Dimethicone/PEG-10/15 Crosspolymer, Methicone, 1,2-Hexanediol, Aluminum Hydroxide, Cyclopentasiloxane, Diisostearyl Malate
how_to_use: Apply the desired amount to the lips, then layer to achieve the preferred intensity.

name: Green Tangerine Vitamin C Serum Sheet Mask
text:
Goodal — Green Tangerine Vitamin C Serum Sheet Mask

The star of this mask is green tangerine—a fruit with powerful antioxidant properties that grows only in Korea, specifically on Jeju Island, a UNESCO Global Geopark known for its nature. In the short term, the mask makes the complexion look brighter and more even; with consistent use, it helps reduce dark spots and post-acne marks. What matters for comfort: the sheet fits closely and doesn’t slip—extra points for usability.

Composition/INCI: Orange Peel Oil, Hydroxyacetophenone, Niacinamide, Ethylhexylglycerin, Bergamot Peel Oil, Linalool, Xanthophyll, Maltodextrin, Limonene, Disodium EDTA, Tangerine Extract, Tocopherol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Methylpropanediol, Carbomer, Gum Arabic, Butylene Glycol, Lemon Peel Oil, Lavender Oil, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Caprylyl Glycol, Ascorbic Acid, Hydrolyzed Saccharide, Allantoin, Hydrolyzed Jojoba Esters, Diglycerin, Polyglyceryl-10 Myristate, Ylang-Ylang Flower Oil, Caffeine, Water, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Marshmallow Root Extract, Sodium Carbonate, Tromethamine, Eucalyptus Leaf Extract, Glycerin.
how_to_use: Apply the mask to cleansed skin, smoothing it evenly over the face. Leave on for 10–20 minutes. Remove and gently pat to help the essence absorb fully.

name: SEOUL 1988 Eye Cream: Retinal Liposome 4%
text:
K-Secret — SEOUL 1988 Eye Cream: Retinal Liposome 4%

A multifunctional eye cream designed to target wrinkles, pigmentation, and signs of fatigue in the eye area. With modern derm-active ingredients such as retinal, bakuchiol, and peptides, it supports skin renewal, improves texture, and boosts elasticity.

Natural components in the formula offer antioxidant and soothing benefits, while hyaluronic acid and glycerin provide long-lasting hydration and help maintain water balance.

The product can work even for sensitive skin thanks to the combination of fermented soybean extract and 4% liposomal retinal. Liposomes are microcapsules that help increase efficacy by stabilizing retinal and delivering it more safely to deeper layers.

Suitable for all skin types, especially recommended for skin prone to dryness.

Important: the manufacturer does not recommend use during pregnancy and breastfeeding, and advises against combining with exfoliating products or Vitamin C.

How to use: apply a small amount to clean, dry skin. Finish with a moisturizing cream.

Because retinal is more potent than retinol, introduce it gradually:
1–2 weeks: 1–2 times per week
3–4 weeks: every other day
Week 5 and beyond: daily.

Key ingredients: Adenosine; Peptide Complex; Vitamin E; Vitamin C; Niacinamide; Fermented Soybean Extract; Hyaluronic Acid; Bakuchiol; Peptides

Composition/INCI: Tocopherol, Sorbitan Olivate, Cetearyl Olivate, Adenosine, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Rehmannia Chinensis Root Extract, Propanediol, sh-Oligopeptide-2, Lactobacillus/Rice Ferment, Dioscorea Japonica Root Extract, 1,2-Hexanediol, Arctium Lappa Root Extract, sh-Polypeptide-1, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Polyglyceryl-10 Oleate, Dipropylene Glycol, Silica, Ethylhexylglycerin, Pentaerythrityl Tetraethylhexanoate, sh-Oligopeptide-1, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Water, Saccharomyces/Coix Lacryma-Jobi Ma-Yuen Seed Ferment Filtrate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Saccharomyces/Potato Extract Ferment Filtrate, Adenosine, Butylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, Butylene Glycol, Bakuchiol, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Retinal, Disodium EDTA, Lactobacillus/Soybean Ferment Extract, Tromethamine, Phytosteryl/Behenyl/Octyldodecyl Lauroyl Glutamate, Brassica Campestris (Rapeseed) Sterols, Cnidium Officinale Root Extract, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Aluminum/Magnesium Hydroxide Stearate, Lactobacillus/Panax Ginseng Root Ferment Filtrate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Paeonia Suffruticosa Root Extract, Cholesterol, Glyceryl Stearate, Carbomer.
how_to_use: Apply a small amount to clean, dry skin. Finish with a moisturizing cream. Since retinal is more potent than retinol, introduce it gradually: weeks 1–2 (1–2x/week), weeks 3–4 (every other day), week 5+ (daily).

name: REVITAL MODELING PACK
text:
ALOEN — REVITAL MODELING PACK

A two-phase modeling mask with an instant soothing effect. Phase one насыщает the skin with natural components: a five-seed extract complex helps improve elasticity, while grape seed oil gently exfoliates and smooths texture. Phase two uses the patented Hydro Colonade Network technology for intensive hydration.

Instant effects:
- soothes the skin
- intensely hydrates and nourishes
- grape seed oil: exfoliates and refines texture
- 5-seed extract complex: improves elasticity and strengthens the epidermal barrier

Clinical tests showed that with prolonged use, skin elasticity increased by 11.3%, and wrinkle depth decreased by 6.5%.

In our box, you get a single-use set; masks are sold only in a pack of 10 and cost 7000 RUB.

Composition/INCI: Calcium Sulfate, Tetrapotassium Pyrophosphate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Safflower Seed Oil, Green Tea Seed Oil, Chia Seed Oil, Broccoli Seed Oil, Maltodextrin, Dimethyl Silylate Silica, Limonene, Black Currant Seed Oil, Olive Oil, Gold, Orange Peel Oil, Camphor Oil, Sea Buckthorn Oil, Algin, Grape Seed Powder, Polyglyceryl-3 Cocoate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Water, Aloe Vera Leaf Extract, Linalool, Gardenia Fruit Extract, Walnut Shell Powder, Glycerin, Tomato Seed Oil, Trihydroxystearin.
how_to_use: Thoroughly mix the contents of the two sachets in one bowl until uniform. Apply to the face and décolleté, avoiding the eye area. Note: the mixture starts to set, so apply within 5 minutes after opening. Remove after 20–30 minutes, starting from the lower part of the face and peeling upward.

name: Neroli Garden Boosting Spray Serum
text:
URIID — Neroli Garden Boosting Spray Serum

Reading URIID’s spray description feels like a superfood or vitamin smoothie: a blend of avocado, yellow camellia, and sunflower oils, green tea extract, and bamboo water—all designed to boost radiance.

But the key here is neroli extract—an effective anti-aging component that helps smooth fine lines, revive and tone skin that has lost firmness. Neroli oil is often used to help reduce visible redness and irritation; it also supports regeneration and can perform well in acne-care routines.

To get 1 kg of neroli oil, about 1000 kg of neroli flowers are required. URIID sources the oil using an eco-friendly method to preserve as many beneficial properties as possible.

Key ingredients: Adenosine; Neroli Extract; Vitamin E

Composition/INCI: Sunflower Seed Oil, Potassium Hyaluronate, Pentylene Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Houttuynia Extract, Disodium EDTA, Lactobacillus Ferment Lysate, Dipropylene Glycol, Betaine, Panthenol, Hydroxyethyl Urea, Tocopherol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Avocado Oil, Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, Allantoin, Bamboo Hydrosol, Soybean Oil, Butylene Glycol, Hyaluronic Acid, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hyaluronate, Adenosine, Matricaria Flower Extract, Annatto Seed Oil, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronate, Camellia Japonica Seed Oil, Polypropylsilsesquioxane, 1,2-Hexanediol, Water, Neroli Flower Oil (20 ppm), Sodium Chloride, Green Tea Leaf Extract, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Bifida Ferment Filtrate, Neroli Flower Extract (2250 ppm), Glycerin, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid.
how_to_use: Spray onto clean skin, use to set makeup, or dampen a cotton pad and apply to dry areas as a quick mask. Can also be used as a lightweight hydrating mist for hair.

name: W.O.W Re:Booster Eye Cream
text:
Dr. MISIMOU — W.O.W Re:Booster Eye Cream

Eye care is a key step in daily skincare, especially when there are signs of aging and thinning. This cream’s name promises what it delivers—a visible “wow” effect. It is designed to brighten and restore elasticity in delicate zones where aging often starts first.

It also targets pigmentation. With multiple forms of hyaluronic acid, it hydrates deeply, nourishes, and helps restore the skin’s hydrolipid balance.

One of the main advantages is the presence of epidermal growth factors (4GF)—proteins that support renewal, growth, and cell division, and help promote collagen synthesis. This means wrinkle care happens not only at the surface level but also at the cellular level. Volufiline and thiotaurine work together to reduce wrinkle depth, smooth expression lines, and help densify the thin, sensitive eye-area skin.

Most ingredients carry EWG GREEN ratings (excluding natural extracts). The product is packaged with a metal applicator for hygienic use and a gentle lymphatic-style massage.

Composition/INCI: Glyceryl Caprylate, sh-Oligopeptide-1, sh-Polypeptide-15, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Taurate, Niacinamide, Ethylhexylglycerin, Thiotaurine, Trehalose, Polyglyceryl-6 Polyricinoleate, Betaine, Panthenol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Carbomer, Sodium DNA, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Isopentyldiol, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Poly-L-Lactic Acid, Anemarrhena Asphodeloides Root Extract, Adenosine, Jojoba Oil, sh-Polypeptide-22, Madecassoside, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, 1,2-Hexanediol, Water, sh-Oligopeptide-2, Tremella Extract, Arginine, Glycerin.
how_to_use: After toner and serum, apply a small amount (1–2 pumps) to the eye area and gently massage with the applicator. Use twice daily (morning and evening). Do not apply a thick layer to avoid unwanted puffiness.

name: Azulene Microfiber Mask
text:
Be'Balance — Azulene Microfiber Mask

An azulene mask that helps reduce redness, provides a cooling effect, strengthens the skin’s natural protective functions, and deeply hydrates.

The formula combines herbal extracts and centella asiatica, supporting healthier-looking skin and helping protect against external irritants while preventing moisture loss.

How to use: after toner, apply serum and let it absorb. Place the mask on and leave for 10–20 minutes. Remove and gently pat the remaining essence over the face and neck. Finish with a cream. The set includes three components and is intended for one use.

Key ingredients: Centella Asiatica Extract; Azulene; Proprietary Herbal Extracts

Composition/INCI: Polysorbate 60, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Adenosine, Propanediol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Bis-PEG-18 Methyl Ether Dimethyl Silane, Betaine, Lavender Extract, Propylene Glycol, Panthenol, Oregano Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Ethylhexylglycerin, Water, Snail Secretion Filtrate, Sodium Guaiazulene Sulfonate, Allantoin, Butylene Glycol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Disodium EDTA, Tromethamine, Rosemary Extract, Methylpropanediol, Centella Asiatica Extract, Dimethicone, Tea Tree Leaf Oil, Thyme Extract, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Fragrance, Carbomer, Glyceryl Acrylate/Acrylic Acid Copolymer.
how_to_use: After toner, apply serum and let it absorb. Place the mask on for 10–20 minutes. Remove and pat the remaining essence into the face and neck. Finish with a cream. Single-use set.

name: Control Balancing Emulsion
text:
11Huesday — Control Balancing Emulsion

A soothing, low-acidity emulsion (pH 5.5) that provides hydration and helps maintain a healthy skin pH balance.

Its lightweight texture absorbs quickly, leaving skin feeling comfortably moisturized, and supports recovery year-round—especially after the heating season.

Healthy skin maintains a natural pH around 5.5. When pH shifts toward alkaline, the barrier can weaken, sensitivity can increase, and excess sebum may contribute to irritation. If pH is too low, frequent acid use can lead to dryness and flaking.

To support the skin’s protective mantle, mild-acidic products are recommended. This emulsion helps reinforce a healthy microbiome and protect against dehydration.

Key ingredients: Sodium Hyaluronate; Panthenol (Vitamin B5); Jojoba Seed Oil; Ceramide NP; Multi Ex BSASM Plus; Witch Hazel Water

Composition/INCI: Sorbitan Olivate, Madecassic Acid, Madecassoside, Cetearyl Olivate, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Flower Extract, 1,2-Hexanediol, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Lavandin Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Panthenol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Ceramide NP, Butylene Glycol, Asiatic Acid, Water, Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose Distearate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Disodium EDTA, Polygonum Cuspidatum Root Extract, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Water, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Centella Asiatica Extract, Dimethicone, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Glycerin, Gluconolactone, Arginine, Xanthan Gum, Sorbitan Stearate, Asiaticoside, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Jojoba Seed Oil, Glyceryl Stearate, Carbomer, Lavender Oil.
how_to_use: After toner/serum, apply a small amount to the face and spread with gentle massage motions. If needed, finish with a moisturizing cream.

name: Truffle Water Essence
text:
Jenny House — Truffle Water Essence

It may sound like scientists found an “elixir of youth”—black truffle. Once a delicacy for royalty, it is now extracted and used in creams and serums. Black truffle is rich in minerals, amino acids, Vitamin C, and retinoids—one ingredient can feel like a whole skincare shelf.

Fun fact: it’s widely mentioned that Lady Gaga visited the Jenny House salon in Seoul and took home products from this line.

Composition/INCI: Xanthan Gum, Black Truffle Extract, Niacinamide, Ethylhexylglycerin, Bergamot Oil, Sodium Stearate, Orange Oil, Geranium Flower Oil, Dextrin, Tea Tree Leaf Oil, Adenosine, Citric Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Laureth-20, Rose Oil, Propanediol, Carrot Seed Oil, Amyris Oil, Aureobasidium Yeast Filtrate, Sugarcane Extract, Vetiver Oil, Frankincense Oil, 1,2-Hexanediol, Disodium EDTA, Water, Methyl Gluceth-20, Cocoa Seed Extract, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Carrageenan Extract.
how_to_use: Apply to cleansed facial skin after toner—or immediately after cleansing.

name: Makiol Water Gel Cream
text:
BOTANITY — Makiol Water Gel Cream

A refreshing water-gel cream with sebum-regulating benefits that helps reduce greasy shine while providing instant hydration. It contains the patented Makiol Complex™ to help address breakouts, inflammation, and blackheads. The formula also includes a proprietary component, Purinol™, derived from zucchini extracts, supporting cleansing and an antioxidant protective barrier.

Vitamin capsules with idebenone and Vitamin C melt gently on contact, helping tone, hydrate, and improve elasticity and smoothness. They also help protect the skin from exposome factors—environmental and lifestyle stressors.

The gel texture nourishes without heaviness, making it a strong fit for oily and combination skin and for summer use. It supports soothing and hydrolipid balance via Bi-Gel technology, which stabilizes oil particles without surfactants for faster absorption.

Suitable for all skin types, especially recommended for oily, combination, and acne-prone skin. For sensitive skin, patch testing is recommended.

Key ingredients: Mung Bean Extract; Idebenone; Tea Tree Leaf Extract; Sea Buckthorn Extract; Cypress Leaf Extract; Vitamin C (Ascorbic Acid)

Composition/INCI: Cypress Leaf Extract, Hydroxyacetophenone, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Neem Flower Extract, Disodium EDTA, Beta-Glucan, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Betaine, Tocopherol, Methyl Trimethicone, Isostearyl Alcohol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Fructooligosaccharides, Agar, Sea Buckthorn Extract, Methylpropanediol, Butylene Glycol, Hydroxydecyl Ubiquinone, Ceramide NP, Honokiol, Laminaria Japonica Extract, Ascorbyl Tetraisopalmitate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Dipropylene Glycol, Isononyl Isononanoate, Ethylcellulose, Xanthan Gum, Neem Leaf Extract, Fig Extract, Eclipta Extract, 1,2-Hexanediol, Tea Tree Leaf Extract, Guar Gum, Water, Mung Bean Extract, Butylene Glycol Cocoate, Centella Asiatica Extract, Glycerin, Magnolol, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid.
how_to_use: Apply an appropriate amount to cleansed, prepped skin after toner and serum. Let it absorb before applying SPF or makeup.

name: Yuja Radiance Mask
text:
Ttat — Yuja Radiance Mask

Yuzu (often called an “Asian mandarin”) became popular in Europe through gastronomy—used in desserts, ice cream, and lemonade. Here, it’s showcased as a valuable skincare ingredient. Yuja Radiance Mask is designed to help create an even tone and natural glow, making skin look polished in about 15 minutes.

The base is yuzu citrus extract, associated with Vitamin C content—a potent antioxidant and one of the key brightening ingredients in skincare. Thanks to its plant origin, the extract is generally gentle and can help soothe tired-looking skin.

Key ingredients: 12 Vitamins; FRUCTAN (patented HA-based complex); Panthenol (Vitamin B5)

Composition/INCI: Glyceryl Caprylate, Cyanocobalamin, Niacinamide, Biotin, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Disodium EDTA, Riboflavin, Beta-Glucan, Yuja Extract (50 ppb), Inositol, Betaine, Tocopherol, Panthenol, Sorbitan Isostearate, Water, Fructan, Sodium Hyaluronate, Butylene Glycol, Polyglyceryl-10 Stearate, Linolenic Acid, Allantoin, Propanediol, Lemon Extract, Pyridoxine, Limonene, Folic Acid, Thiamine HCl, Xanthan Gum/Sodium Acryloyldimethyltaurate Copolymer, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Yuja Peel Oil (120,000 ppb), Glycerin, Lactobacillus Ferment, Beta-Carotene.
how_to_use: Cleanse, then prep with toner. Apply the mask and leave on for 15–20 minutes. Remove and gently pat to help the remaining essence absorb.

name: Artist Touch Brow Duo
text:
The Thim — Artist Touch Brow Duo

An eyebrow pencil with three parts: an angled tip, powder, and a spoolie.

The triangular, non-standard tip helps create hair-like strokes for a more natural brow look. The powder fills gaps and softly blends the color.

We chose the versatile Cocoa Brown shade, suitable for both blondes and brunettes. You can control intensity by pressure on the pencil or the powder sponge.

No sharpening needed. The long-wear formula helps avoid touch-ups during the day—brows look as good in the evening as they did in the morning.

Composition/INCI: Mica, Red Iron Oxide, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Titanium Dioxide, Sucrose Tetrastearate Triacetate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Magnesium Myristate, Phenoxyethanol, C10-30 Cholesterol/Lanosterol Ester, Bisabolol, Dipentaerythrityl Hexahydroxystearate/Hexastearate/Hexaloginate, Black Iron Oxide, Sumac Tree Fruit Wax, Yellow Iron Oxide, Aluminum Hydroxide, Triethylhexanoin, Caprylyl Glycol, Octyldodecanol, Octyldodecylstearoylstearate, Red Iron Oxide. [Powder]: Talc, Dimethicone, Hexylene Glycol, Hydrogen Dimethicone, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Jojoba Seed Oil, [01 Cocoa Brown].
how_to_use: Brush brows with the spoolie. Use the powder to fill gaps. Use the thin edge of the pencil to draw hair-like strokes and define the tail, then softly shade with the wider side.

name: Grind Vita Cleansing Balm
text:
FREBITS — Grind Vita Cleansing Balm

A balm that “grinds away” traces of a heavy day: long-wear makeup, buildup, dead skin cells, and SPF. The grinder-style packaging works like a mill—twist the cap to dispense a fresh portion.

Smart packaging helps protect Vitamin C from air exposure and preserve performance, while keeping use hygienic and economical.

Beyond the packaging, the formula delivers results: a vegan blend of natural components removes makeup and sunscreen, helps clear blackheads, and supports the look of tighter pores. Sea buckthorn oil and Vitamin E add glow and barrier support, while hyaluronic acid helps prevent over-drying.

On contact with water, it transforms from dense balm to soft oil, then to a gentle milk for thorough yet comfortable cleansing.

Key ingredients: Ceramides; Sea Buckthorn Oil; Vitamin C; Hyaluronic Acid; Vitamin E; AHA/LHA

Composition/INCI: Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Sorbeth-30 Tetraoleate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Isododecane, Hydrogenated Poly(C6-14 Olefin), Synthetic Wax, Camellia Japonica Seed Oil, Hydrogenated Coconut Oil, Cedrus Atlantica Bark Oil, Trihydroxystearin, Tocopherol, Hippophae Rhamnoides Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Salvia Sclarea (Clary) Oil, Ascorbic Acid, Capryloyl Salicylic Acid, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Oil, Saccharomyces/Xylinum/Black Tea Ferment, Octyldodecanol, Aqua, Butylene Glycol, Citric Acid, Ectoin, Gluconolactone, Totarol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Maltodextrin, Echium Plantagineum Seed Oil, Glycerin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Sunflower Seed Oil Unsaponifiables, Hippophae Rhamnoides Water, Gardenia Florida Fruit Extract, Propanediol, Cardiospermum Halicacabum Extract, Cichorium Intybus Root Extract, Gynostemma Pentaphyllum Extract, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Sucrose, Lupinus Albus Seed Extract, Poncirus Trifoliata Fruit Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Angelica Keiskei Extract, Ceramide NP, Corchorus Olitorius Leaf Extract, Dioscorea Japonica Root Extract, Hibiscus Esculentus Fruit Extract, Lactobacillus Ferment, Nelumbo Nucifera Root Extract, Oenothera Biennis Flower Extract, Benzyl Glycol, Hydrolyzed Glycosaminoglycans, Caprylyl Glycol, Aspergillus Ferment, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Aloe Polysaccharides, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Hyaluronic Acid, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Potassium Hyaluronate.
how_to_use: Twist the dispenser to dispense product. Apply to dry skin and massage. Wet fingertips with very warm water and continue massaging until the oil turns into a milky emulsion. Rinse.

name: Bifida Biome Complex Ampoule
text:
Ma:nyo — Bifida Biome Complex Ampoule

In cold seasons we often focus on body immunity, but what about the skin’s local immunity? This is where bifida lysates come in—processed components of beneficial bacteria.

Bifidobacteria are “good bacteria” that live in different parts of the body, including facial skin, and are part of the microbiome—a key factor for resilient, healthy-looking skin.

Balance matters: when the microbiome is supported, skin can better defend against environmental stressors and allocate resources to regeneration.

This ampoule features a high probiotic concentration (72%). These ingredients help reinforce the skin barrier, reduce reactivity to temperature shifts, air quality, and wind, and support regeneration.

Recognized benefits commonly associated with probiotic ampoules include improved firmness, more even tone, and smoother-looking skin.

Composition/INCI: Lactobacillus/Fermented Pumpkin Filtrate, Pentylene Glycol, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Niacinamide, Ethylhexylglycerin, Benzyl Glycol, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Cocoa Bean Extract, Saccharomyces Ferment Filtrate, Bifida Ferment Filtrate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Madecassic Acid, Dextrin, Carbomer, Squalane, Bifida Ferment Lysate, Lactobacillus Ferment Lysate, Sodium Phytate, Butylene Glycol, Potassium Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Algin, Hyaluronic Acid, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hyaluronate, Asiatic Acid, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Propanediol, Xanthan Gum, Copper Tripeptide-1, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caffeine, Hydrolyzed Glycosaminoglycans, Epigallocatechin Gallate, Water, Aureobasidium Pullulans Ferment, Lactococcus Ferment Lysate, Edelweiss Extract, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Asiaticoside, Adenosine, Tromethamine, Physalis Extract, Glycerin, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8.
how_to_use: Apply to cleansed skin after toner, let it absorb, then seal with a cream.

name: Bloody Peel
text:
SKIN1004 — Bloody Peel

Regular skin cell renewal is one of the key markers of healthy facial skin. When renewal slows, concerns like inflammation, closed comedones, hyperpigmentation, and premature aging can become more visible. Acids help support timely exfoliation—among other benefits.

This active peeling serum combines AHA and BHA acids as an at-home alternative to professional procedures. A “bloody” complex with red berry vitamins plus pepper and beet extracts exfoliates, helps cleanse pores, supports post-acne care, and promotes regeneration.

Glycolic and salicylic acids work synergistically: they help speed renewal, brighten dark spots, and provide antibacterial support. With 17% glycolic acid, it aims for visible improvements in tone, texture, and post-acne marks, while salicylic acid helps regulate sebum and address blackheads.

Due to the strong formula, use no more than 1–2 times per week.

Key ingredients: Tomato Extract; Apple Extract; Salicylic Acid; Pomegranate Extract; Pepper Extract; Glycolic Acid; Beet Root Extract; Berry Complex

Composition/INCI: Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Squalane, Malpighia Emarginata (Acerola) Fruit Extract, Ethylhexylglycerin, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Extract, Lecithin, Dextrin, Phytosterols, Ceramide NP, Salicylic Acid, Butylene Glycol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Sodium Hyaluronate, Punica Granatum Fruit Extract, Disodium EDTA, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Hydrolyzed Pea Protein, Propanediol, Glycolic Acid (17%), Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Fruit Extract, Water, Glycerin, Gluconolactone, Xanthan Gum, Capsicum Annuum Fruit Extract, Niacinamide, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Fruit Extract, Solanum Lycopersicum (Tomato) Fruit Extract, Beta Vulgaris (Beet) Root Extract, Gardenia Florida Fruit Extract, 2-Hexanediol, Potassium Hydroxide.
how_to_use: Apply an appropriate amount to cleansed skin, avoiding the eye and lip areas. Massage in and leave for 1 minute. Rinse thoroughly with warm water. Finish with a cream. Use 1–2 times per week.

name: Vitamin C Brightening Ampoule
text:
COMMONLABS — Vitamin C Brightening Ampoule

A multifruit ampoule that improves overall skin condition by supplying vitamins, helps brighten dark spots and post-acne marks, and supports skin renewal by addressing dead skin buildup. It contains yuja (a Korean citrus) known for strong antioxidant potential.

A patented Skinpore Controller (from orange, quince, and lemon balm extracts) is designed to help manage the look of enlarged pores. Sea buckthorn hydrosol supplies nutrients and Vitamin E.

Despite common myths, the product can be used in summer—just apply sunscreen 30 minutes before going outside. The brightening effect is cumulative with daily use, helping improve tone and restore radiance.

The lightweight, water-based texture absorbs quickly and is positioned as suitable for all skin types.

Composition/INCI: Lemon Balm Extract, Astaxanthin, Grape Fruit Extract, Glyceryl Acrylate/Acrylic Acid Copolymer, Niacinamide, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Neem Flower Extract, Disodium EDTA, Linalool, Kiwi Fruit Extract, Trehalose, Dipropylene Glycol, Maltodextrin, Limonene, Raspberry Fruit Extract, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Saccharide Isomerate, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Blueberry Extract, Lingonberry Extract, Carbomer, Yuja Fruit Extract, Butylene Glycol, Blackberry Fruit Extract, Hydrolyzed Saccharide, Strawberry Fruit Extract, Citric Acid, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Ascorbic Acid, Pineapple Fruit Extract, Allantoin, Sweet Orange Flower Extract, Grapefruit Peel Oil, Quince Fruit Extract, Sodium Citrate, Neem Leaf Extract, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Sea Buckthorn Hydrosol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Polyglutamic Acid, Water, Turmeric Root Extract, Holy Basil Leaf Extract, Corallina Officinalis (Red Algae) Extract, Apple Fruit Extract, Peach Fruit Extract, Arginine, Bilberry Extract, Glycerin.
how_to_use: After toner, apply 2–3 drops and gently spread over the face with tapping motions. Use twice daily (morning and evening). During use, always apply sunscreen before going outside.

name: Fake Trick Double Eyeliner
text:
IM'UNNY — Fake Trick Double Eyeliner

Many people think eyeliner is only for dramatic, Old-Hollywood wings. Then you discover IM'UNNY Fake Trick Double Eyeliner and realize it deserves a place in any makeup bag—especially for those who prefer natural, quick makeup.

This is a nude-toned liner designed to enhance the eyes and subtly adjust contours for a more refined look. Its signature use is creating the aegyo-sal effect under the lower lid (a soft, youthful highlight line). In Korean, “aegyo-sal” translates as “smiling eyes.”

You can also use it on the upper lid as the brand suggests—especially effective for those with a less-defined upper crease. The shade and fine brush are also great for trendy faux freckles.

It’s versatile beyond the eye area: apply along the bridge of the nose or around the nostrils for a subtle contour, highlight collarbones, or use on very light brows to define hairs.

Composition/INCI: Ethylhexylglycerin, Portulaca Extract, Disodium EDTA, Aloe Leaf Extract, Diphenyl Dimethicone, Triethylhexanoin, Octanediol, CI 17200 (Red 33), Diethylhexyl Sodium Sulfosuccinate, CI 19140 (Yellow 5), Phenoxyethanol, Marshmallow Extract, Cynanchum Atratum Extract, Aminomethyl Propanol, Hydrolyzed Lecithin, Laminaria Japonica Extract, 2-Hexanediol, Octylacrylamide/Acrylate Copolymer, Diglycerin, Butylene Glycol, Pentylene Glycol, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Germ Extract, Water, Acrylate Copolymer, CI 42090 (Blue 1), Alcohol Denat., Glycerin, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Laureth-25.
how_to_use: 1) Add dimension starting from the center of the lid and blend outward with fingers. 2) Apply to the nose, chin, or other desired areas and lightly blend for a contouring effect.

name: Vitamin C Brightening Sun Serum
text:
COMMONLABS — Vitamin C Brightening Sun Serum

A tone-evening sunscreen serum designed to address pigmentation and help boost overall radiance. Thanks to Vitamin C, it nourishes and tones the skin, delivers antioxidant benefits, and includes a multi-vitamin blend.

The formula supports hydration and helps prevent dryness even after prolonged sun exposure. It includes a patented ingredient—sea daffodil—which targets dark spots.

It protects against broad-spectrum UV and helps prevent photoaging by limiting UV-driven oxidative stress. Clinical tests report SPF50+ PA++++ achieved via photostable next-generation chemical filters.

The brand combines liquid hydrating components with sunscreen granules in one formula: hydration is delivered immediately; later, sunscreen granules break and spread. With its light texture, a moisturizer can be used underneath if desired (especially for dry skin).

The product is positioned as suitable for all skin types, including sensitive.

Composition/INCI: Ethylhexylglycerin, Ascorbic Acid, Disodium EDTA, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Niacinamide, Linoleic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopherol, Biotin, Folic Acid, Cyanocobalamin, Water, Alcohol, Methylpropanediol, Xanthan Gum, Glutathione, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexyl Triazone, Pentylene Glycol, Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Citrate, Hydroxyacetophenone, Citric Acid, Limonene, Linalool, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Marshmallow Flower Extract, Lime Fruit Extract, Unshiu Mandarin Peel Extract, Lactobacillus Ferment Lysate, Cranberry Fruit Extract, Lemon Fruit Extract, Grapefruit Fruit Extract, Polysilicone-15, Alkyl Dimethyl Silyl Polypropylsilsesquioxane, Dibutyl Ethylhexanoyl Glutamide, Sodium Acrylate Crosspolymer-2, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Saccharide Isomerate, Linolenic Acid, Menadione, Dibutyl Adipate, Diethylamino Hydroxybenzoyl Hexyl Benzoate, Phenethyl Benzoate, Bergamot Fruit Oil, Cynanchum Root Extract, Yuja Peel Extract, Kakadu Plum Extract, Sea Buckthorn Fruit Extract, Pancratium Maritimum (Sea Daffodil) Extract, Dibutyl Lauroyl Glutamide, Sodium Polyacryloyldimethyl Taurate, Acetyl Glucosamine, Pantothenic Acid, Bioflavonoids, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, 1,2-Hexanediol, Bis-Ethylhexyloxyphenol Methoxyphenyl Triazine, Pyridoxine, Thiamine HCl, Riboflavin, Isoamyl p-Methoxycinnamate, Strawberry Fruit Extract, Retinol, Silica, Raspberry Fruit Extract.
how_to_use: Apply a small amount to face, neck, and décolleté (if exposed). Spread evenly until absorbed. Use as the final step of skincare at least 30 minutes before going outside. Reapply every 2–3 hours during sun exposure. Remove with cleansing oil or a biphasic remover.

name: Organic Cotton Treatment Toning Pad
text:
RE:P — Organic Cotton Treatment Toning Pad

Double-sided organic cotton pads soaked in a toner based on natural herbs. They tone, improve the look of skin, and prep it for subsequent skincare, helping boost performance.

The mesh side provides gentle exfoliation; the smoother side removes remaining residue while helping soothe.

Key ingredients: Lavender; Chamomile; Calendula

Composition/INCI: Glyceryl Caprylate, Rosewood Oil, Ethylhexylglycerin, Melissa Flower/Leaf/Stem Water, Bergamot Oil, Glycereth-25 PCA Isostearate, Zanthoxylum Piperitum Fruit Extract, Helichrysum Italicum Flower Water, Pulsatilla Koreana Extract, Neem Leaf Extract, Lavender Flower Water, Chamomile Extract, Usnea Barbata Extract, Linalool, Butylene Glycol, Mugwort Extract, Lavender Oil, Comfrey Leaf Extract, 2-Hexanediol, Helichrysum Extract, Limonene, Orange Peel Oil, Sodium Citrate, Eucalyptus Leaf Oil, Rosemary Leaf Oil, Lavender Flower Extract, Water, Damask Rose Flower Water, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Calendula Extract, Glycerin, Chamomile Flower Water.
how_to_use: Use after cleansing. Wipe the face with the mesh side for gentle exfoliation. Flip and wipe with the smooth side to remove remaining residue. Follow with a moisturizer.

name: Pure Hyaluronic Acid Serum
text:
Cos De Baha — Pure Hyaluronic Acid Serum

You likely already know hyaluronic acid well. It’s popular for a reason: its key ability is to attract and retain water better than most ingredients. Pure Hyaluronic Acid Serum helps improve elasticity, support a firmer-looking contour, and visually smooth fine lines—making it a reliable choice for hydration-focused routines.

Composition/INCI: Purified Water, Sodium Hyaluronate, 1,2-Hexanediol.
how_to_use: Apply 2–3 drops to slightly damp facial skin. Spread evenly, avoiding the eye area. Let it absorb and follow with a cream if needed.

name: Pink Clay D-Toc Pack
text:
Ma:nyo — Pink Clay D-Toc Pack

This jar has every chance to become a favorite: a muted pink color, a light rose scent, and a smooth, pliable texture. The mask aims to nourish with vitamins, help control oiliness, add brightness, and support acne-prone skin.

Composition/INCI: Bean Extract, Rosehip Extract, Japanese Pepper Fruit Extract, Macadamia Oil, Kaolin, Pulsatilla Koreana Extract, Rosemary Extract, Damask Rose Petal Oil, Potassium Hydroxide, Licorice Extract, Chamomile Extract, Galactomyces Ferment, Grape Seed Oil, Titanium Dioxide, Rosehip Petal Oil, Isoamyl Laurate, Red Wine Extract, Grape Seed Extract, Sunflower Seed Oil, Strawberry Powder, Carmine, Glyceryl Stearate, Carrot Extract, White Willow Bark Extract, Water, Calamine, Cellulose, Cetearyl Alcohol, Oat Extract, Glyceryl Benzoate, Glycerin.
how_to_use: Apply an adequate amount to cleansed skin, avoiding the eye and lip areas. Leave on for 20–30 minutes. Rinse with warm water.

name: Madagascar Centella Quick Calming Pad
text:
SKIN1004 — Madagascar Centella Quick Calming Pad

Need to calm irritated skin fast? These triple-layer pads feature a highly active formula with 49% centella extract plus panthenol. The soothing essence creates a natural cooling sensation, helps remove various impurities, and quickly calms the skin.

The product also includes eco-certified ingredients (EWG-certified) to support transparent formulation.

The pads are crescent-shaped and enlarged to 7 cm, making them convenient for use around the eyes and nose. The formula is positioned as helping reduce irritation and supporting a calmer look.

Key ingredients: Centella Asiatica; Panthenol; Citric Acid

Composition/INCI: Citric Acid, Panthenol, Water, Butylene Glycol, Centella Asiatica Extract (49%), Sodium Hyaluronate, Disodium EDTA, Ethylhexylglycerin, Xanthan Gum, 2-Hexanediol.
how_to_use: Place a pad as a local mask on the area that needs soothing for 3–5 minutes. Massage the remaining essence into the skin until fully absorbed.

name: Vitamin B5 Mask
text:
BRTC — Vitamin B5 Mask

A soothing sheet mask containing panthenol (Vitamin B5), centella asiatica, and aloe vera leaf extract. Especially suitable for dry, sensitive skin and for calming irritation after cosmetic procedures.

Made from 100% organic lyocell, which is designed to be gentle and to help the formula perform effectively.

Key ingredients: Aloe Vera Leaf Extract; Vitamin B5; Centella Asiatica

Composition/INCI: Ethylhexylglycerin, Disodium EDTA, Centella Asiatica Extract, Maltodextrin, Panthenol, Fragrance, PEG-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Broccoli Extract, Carbomer, Benzyl Glycol, Butylene Glycol, Triethanolamine, Allantoin, Hydrolyzed Collagen, 1,2-Hexanediol, Water, Cyclopentasiloxane, Aloe Vera Leaf Extract, Raspberry Ketone, Glycerin.
how_to_use: Separate one sachet to avoid opening both. After cleansing and toner, apply the mask evenly and leave on for 10–20 minutes. Remove and pat the remaining essence over the face and neck. Single-use.

name: Double Shot Oil to Foam Cleanser
text:
HAMEL — Double Shot Oil to Foam Cleanser

A 2-in-1 cleansing oil that dissolves SPF, removes makeup, and lifts away daily impurities. It quickly foams, helping rinse off residue and cleanse pores while aiming to preserve a healthy skin microbiome.

Ideal for those who like double cleansing but want a simpler routine—one product instead of two. When dispensed, the oil and serum phases mix and form an airy foam that helps remove sunscreen, makeup, and grime, including dust.

A patented PORE AWAY COMPLEX™ (fruit AHA acids and frankincense resin) helps remove dead skin buildup and absorb excess sebum, supporting clearer-looking pores. Nourishing oils help prevent over-drying and maintain hydrolipid balance.

A vegan formula designed to be gentle and suitable for oily/combination skin as well as dry skin that can feel tight after harsher cleansers.

Key ingredients: Galactomyces Ferment Filtrate; Lactobacillus Ferment; Jojoba Seed Oil; Bifida Ferment Lysate; Ceramide NP; Orange Peel Oil

name: Azulene Mild UV Tone-Up Sun Primer
text:
SUR.MEDIC+ — Azulene Mild UV Tone-Up Sun Primer

Hydration, and more hydration—especially if you’re planning to wear makeup. That’s why this edition includes a multifunctional 2-in-1 sun primer. The high protection level (SPF50+ PA++++) helps shield skin from UV exposure, while the creamy formula preps the skin for makeup.

It works like a makeup base: it absorbs quickly, helps foundation apply more evenly, and improves wear time. The lightweight texture with a subtle purple tone helps visually even out the complexion and add a natural glow—purple-toned bases are often used to neutralize dullness and the look of uneven pigmentation.

The non-pilling, dewy finish also supports the popular Korean “glass skin” look—skin that appears clean, smooth, and naturally radiant.

UV filters are generally divided into mineral (physical) and chemical. Mineral filters sit on the skin and help reflect/deflect UV rays. Chemical filters absorb UV energy and convert it, and in the process they can degrade.

This primer is built around mineral UV protection with Titanium Dioxide. Titanium Dioxide is a mineral-origin white pigment that is generally considered non-toxic, does not penetrate into the skin, and is associated with a low risk of irritation, which is why mineral filters are often used in products for sensitive skin.

Clinical hypoallergenic testing was conducted at a skin research center in Seoul. In a two-month study (participants aged 19–59), the irritation index reached 0.00, supporting low-irritation use, including for sensitive facial skin.

The formula also helps calm and deeply hydrate irritated skin, supported by a high amount of azulene.

Key ingredients: Lemon Extract; Guaiazulene; Centella Asiatica; Bifida Ferment Lysate; Hyaluronic Acid; Ceramide NP

Composition/INCI: Fragrance, C20-22 Alkyl Phosphate, Tocopherols, Peppermint Oil, Pentylene Glycol, Sodium Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Niacinamide, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phytosphingosine, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Ceramide AP, Cholesterol, Prunus Serrulata Flower Extract, Behenyl Alcohol, Panthenol, Potassium Sorbate, Guaiazulene (500 ppm), tert-Butyl Alcohol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Terminalia Ferdinandiana (Kakadu Plum) Extract, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Stearic Acid, Brassica Oleracea (Broccoli) Extract, Ceramide AS, Calendula Officinalis Extract, Methylpropanediol, Ethylhexyl Triazone, Hydroxypropyl Cyclodextrin, Bifida Ferment Lysate, Moringa Oleifera Extract, Disodium EDTA, Portulaca Oleracea Extract, Butylene Glycol, Hyaluronic Acid, Titanium Dioxide, Adenosine, Ceramide NP, Glyceryl Stearate, Bis-Ethylhexyloxyphenol Methoxyphenyl Triazine, Propanediol, Diethylamino Hydroxybenzoyl Hexyl Benzoate, Alcohol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Water, Cetearyl Alcohol, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Tromethamine, Dibutyl Adipate, Butyloctyl Salicylate, Arbutin, Lavender Extract, Polyisobutene, C20-22 Alcohols, Centella Asiatica Extract, Glycerin, Sorbitan Oleate, Ceramide EOP, Glutathione, Ceramide NS, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid

name: V.Biome Firming Cream
text:
Neogen — V.Biome Firming Cream

Vitamins, peptides, and probiotics—combined into an innovative firming “cocktail” by Neogen. This cream targets wrinkle smoothing, facial firmness, and improved elasticity, using liposomal technology to help beneficial components deliver more effectively.

A key advantage is the patented V.Biome Liposome 10% complex, featuring encapsulated components designed to enhance delivery and bioavailability.

The complex also supports the skin’s Natural Moisturizing Factor (NMF) to help retain moisture, reduce water loss, and support a more resilient-looking skin texture.

Bonus: the lid includes a built-in applicator you can use for application and massage to help improve the look of circulation, reduce puffiness, and soften the appearance of lines around the eyes and nasolabial folds.

Key ingredients: Niacinamide (Vitamin B3); Panthenol (Vitamin B5); Peptide Complex; Vitamin E; Vitamin C; 8 types of Hyaluronic Acid; Liposomes; Probiotics; Mallow Flower Extract

name: Enzyme Beet Bounce Mask
text:
Juice To Cleanse — Enzyme Beet Bounce Mask

Juice To Cleanse is known for vibrant packaging and naturally derived extracts. Their enzyme-based products have been box bestsellers before—and we expect the same for this mask.

The formula is enriched with plant ingredients from Jeju Island extracted via cold processing, plus niacinamide to help hydrate and visually brighten the complexion.

This mask targets several needs at once:
- helps refresh the look of skin and smooth texture
- supports a more even-looking tone
- provides deep hydration
- helps improve the look of firmness

Its signature color comes from beet extract produced using the patented VegeLive℗ technology, designed to preserve nutrients without heat.

A synergistic mix of proteolytic enzymes helps break down surface keratin proteins and gently remove dead skin cells, delivering a refreshed look with minimal irritation.

Suitable even for sensitive skin, as it does not contain synthetic colorants or artificial fragrance.

Key ingredients: Niacinamide; Papain; Beet Root Extract; Ceramide NP; Fermented Pomegranate Extract

name: Water Wash Balm (mini)
text:
Juice to Cleanse – Water Wash Balm (mini)

A perfect cleanser for busy (read: lazy) days. This sherbet-like balm replaces two products: it first dissolves makeup comfortably, then turns into a foamy cleanser upon contact with water to remove impurities.

It feels like a tropical fresh juice for your face. With lemon, lime, mango juice, and papaya extract, it’s like washing your face under a palm tree every evening.

name: Skin Cover Concealer Duo
text:
The Thim — Skin Cover Concealer Duo

On one side, you get a classic liquid concealer with an applicator; on the other, a correcting stick. Skin Cover Concealer Duo is a truly double-ended product designed to cover small, localized imperfections like pimples, as well as bigger concerns like dark under-eye circles or redness after too much sun.

The concealer masks instantly and stays put throughout the day thanks to fine powder pigments that also help control sebum—so makeup is less likely to look shiny or break down. A gel-like component helps visually smooth uneven texture, including the look of fine lines.

The liquid side can be used before or after foundation. The stick is convenient for cheeks, cheekbones, and lips. You can also use it for contouring—highlighting areas like cheekbones, the cupid’s bow, or the tip of the nose.

The shade is designed to be universal.

It doesn’t just cover—Vitamin E helps keep skin feeling comfortable and conditioned during the day. The formula also includes a Vitamin C derivative and UV filters. It won’t replace a dedicated sunscreen, but it can add extra protection in sensitive areas, such as around the eyes.

name: Energy Calming Mask Pack
text:
Ma:nyo — Energy Calming Mask Pack

For irritated, inflamed, and tired-looking skin. This mask is suitable for all skin types and is built around naturally derived ingredients, including peppermint oil and catechins.

The star ingredient is green tea extract: it helps calm the skin, supports elasticity, and promotes recovery.

name: Bifida Biome Concentrate Eye Cream
text:
Ma:nyo – Bifida Biome Concentrate Eye Cream

Among the products in the holiday box, this one has the most pronounced anti-aging focus. Bifida Biome Concentrate Eye Cream is designed for the eye area—where lines often appear first, firmness decreases, and tone can look less even.

The eye contour is highly responsive to external factors, so lack of sleep, expressive facial movements, and UV exposure can show quickly. That’s why Ma:nyo formulated this cream with special attention.

name: Advanced Regenerating Eye Gel Patches
text:
K-SECRET — Advanced Regenerating Eye Gel Patches

Korea produces thousands of eye patch options, and we select the most interesting and effective. These K-SECRET patches help create a fresher, more rested look.

Retinol supports skin renewal, helps improve elasticity, and reduces the look of fine lines. The patches also help with dullness, microtexture, and the appearance of firmness.

The gel texture makes them a true express mask—acting noticeably faster than a cream, so results are often visible right after use. A hygienic spatula is included for easy, clean use.

They’re also versatile: you can apply them not only under the eyes, but also to other target areas—nasolabial folds, forehead expression lines, and neck creases.

Suitable for all skin types, but if your skin is sensitive, use with caution: perform a patch test (inner elbow first, then a small area on the neck) and wait 48 hours. If there is no reaction, proceed.

Key ingredients: Sodium Hyaluronate; Coenzyme Q10; Retinol; Niacinamide; Acetyl Hexapeptide

name: Silky Suncream (mini)
text:
Sonnemur — Silky Suncream (mini)

The more consistent you are with SPF, the higher the chance your skin stays youthful-looking, radiant, and even in tone and texture. No “anti-aging” cream delivers a bigger impact than daily sun protection.

This Sonnemur sunscreen has a delicate texture and high protection (SPF50+ / PA+++), shielding against both UVB and UVA rays.

The patented Repair Control CLR™ technology is designed to help support skin after UV exposure.

The formula also includes adenosine and niacinamide:
- Adenosine supports collagen-related pathways and helps reduce the appearance of fine lines.
- Niacinamide (Vitamin B group) helps support the skin barrier, improves hydration, and helps even tone—reducing the appearance of pigmentation and inflammation.

Unlike many dense, greasy sunscreens that leave a white cast, Silky Suncream feels weightless and absorbs like a good moisturizer. The brand even suggests using it as a makeup base.

Key ingredients: Adenosine; Niacinamide

how_to_use: Apply a sufficient amount as the last step of your morning routine (or 30 minutes before going outside). Reapply every 2–3 hours while outdoors. Use year-round; you may skip only on very overcast winter days when there is no visible sun.

name: Skin Foundation Primer
text:
IM'UNNY — Skin Foundation Primer

A primer is the “foundation” for your makeup. It preps the skin for cosmetics, helps blur the appearance of pores, post-acne marks, fine lines, and uneven texture, and supports longer-lasting makeup with less shine.

The silky texture feels like a lightweight lotion, softening the skin surface quickly. After application, it helps set makeup and keep the skin looking smoother for hours.

A light peach tint helps visually even the complexion and create a subtle “glow from within.” It doesn’t clump and is designed to be non-irritating, making it suitable even for sensitive skin.

Key ingredients: Cypress Flower Water; Chamomile Flower Extract; Centella Asiatica; Soy Oil & Protein

name: Aloen The Blue Moisture Cream
text:
Univera — Aloen The Blue Moisture Cream

A must-have in an anti-aging routine: a moisturizer based on Japanese hot spring (onsen) water. The rich formula helps replenish moisture, support the skin’s hydrolipid barrier, and maintain a comfortable pH balance throughout the day. With soothing benefits, it helps reduce irritation and visible redness.

A key advantage: it pairs well with retinoids, acids, and Vitamin C. The formula includes the patented ALO-M™ complex, featuring calcium, magnesium, and sulfur to nourish the skin and support a calmer-looking complexion. Xylitol and glucose act as boosters to enhance the effectiveness of hydrating and soothing ingredients.

Suitable for all skin types, especially sensitive, dehydrated skin with signs of aging.

name: White Truffle Double Serum & Cream
text:
D’Alba — White Truffle Double Serum & Cream

A two-step skincare format combining a serum and a cream, built around Italian white truffle extract. The gel-serum provides deep hydration and helps calm irritated skin without leaving stickiness.

The cream nourishes, smooths, and supports elasticity.

You can mix the two textures in different ratios depending on your skin type, or use them to target specific areas.

Like the rest of the box products, D’Alba does not test on animals. The formula also received approval from an Italian vegetarian association and emphasizes organically sourced components.

Botanical ingredients support a comfortable application while helping the skin look healthier and more radiant.

Key ingredients: Adenosine; Vitamin B5; Ceramide NP; White Truffle Extract; Botanical Oil Complex; Centella Asiatica

name: Power Homme All In One Solution
text:
BRTC — Power Homme All In One Solution

A practical 3-in-1 staple—because we know how much many men appreciate multifunctional products. This all-in-one emulsion can replace three steps: toner, essence, and moisturizing lotion.

It includes three proprietary complexes:
1) Blue Phyto Complex — hydrating, nourishing, and soothing support for dryness and barrier balance, including post-shave irritation.
2) Tannin Pore Complex — helps reduce the look of excess sebum, shine, and clogged pores, supporting a smoother-looking texture.
3) ProBiome — fermented components aimed at supporting the skin microbiome and resilience, targeting dryness, lines, and breakouts.

Ideal after shaving: helps reduce redness, supports sebum balance, and maintains a comfortable hydrolipid barrier. Suitable for sensitive skin and designed not to over-dry.

how_to_use: After cleansing and shaving, apply a small amount to the face and massage evenly. For dry and sensitive skin, you can apply 2–3 layers.

name: Lipotox Core Cream
text:
BQCELL — Lipotox Core Cream

A powerful anti-aging moisturizing cream featuring liposomes derived from stem-cell conditioned media and peptides—designed to become a centerpiece of your skincare shelf. No, there is no “human DNA in a jar,” but the visible effect is there—and can be noticed even after the first use.

The formula supports a noticeable improvement in skin quality: it helps skin look firmer, reduces the appearance of wrinkles, supports elasticity, evens the complexion, and helps reduce transepidermal water loss.

Anise extract contributes to a brighter-looking complexion and smoother texture, while Scutellaria root supports a calming effect—making it suitable even for sensitive skin.

The product passed hypoallergenic testing (including 5 tests across different skin types). Clinical testing on women aged 30–60 reported measurable improvements after first use, including improvements in the look of eye-area firmness, wrinkles, elasticity, hydration, and radiance.

Key ingredients: Aloe Vera Leaf Extract; Adenosine; Epidermal Growth Factors; Fermented Soybean Extract; Niacinamide; Green Tea Extract; Alloferon; Hydrolyzed Collagen Complex; Fucus Vesiculosus Extract; Hexapeptide

Composition/INCI: Stearic Acid, Polyglyceryl-10 Oleate, Chrysanthemum Indicum Extract, Diospyros Kaki Leaf Extract, Human Adipocyte Conditioned Media Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, 1,2-Hexanediol, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Caprylyl Glycol, Fragrance, Pentylene Glycol, Fucus Vesiculosus Extract, Cetearyl Alcohol, Disodium EDTA, Butylene Glycol, Sorbitan Olivate, Biosaccharide Gum-1, Bacillus/Soybean Ferment Extract, Artemisia Princeps Leaf Extract, Water, Cetearyl Olivate, Lysolecithin, Niacinamide, Camellia Japonica Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Glycerides, Human Stem Cell Conditioned Media, Propanediol, Beeswax, Methionyl r-Clostridium Botulinum Polypeptide-1 Hexapeptide-40, Dipropylene Glycol, Polysorbate 60, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Arginine, Illicium Verum (Anise) Fruit Extract, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Lecithin, Tocopheryl Acetate, Carbomer, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Prunella Vulgaris Extract, Chaenomeles Sinensis Fruit Extract, Adenosine, Phaseolus Radiatus Meristem Cell Culture Extract, Allantoin, Betaine, Arabidopsis Thaliana Extract, Polysorbate 80, Cinnamomum Cassia Bark Extract, Panthenol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Xanthan Gum, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Alloferon-1, Glycerin
how_to_use: Apply an appropriate amount to clean, prepped skin after toner and serum. Allow to absorb before applying sunscreen or makeup.

name: Ceramide 3Days Cream
text:
BRTC — Ceramide 3Days Cream

An intensive ceramide cream that quickly helps relieve dryness and flaking, supports the hydrolipid balance, and strengthens the protective barrier. It also helps reduce skin’s sensitivity to environmental stressors such as temperature swings, dry air, smoke, and UV exposure.

Ceramides are essential skin lipids. Together with cholesterol and fatty acids, they help support the barrier, reduce discomfort associated with dryness, and support healthy-looking renewal—helping the skin hold moisture for longer.

The formula uses a lamellar technology designed to mimic the skin’s lipid layers, helping the emulsion integrate and deliver beneficial ingredients more effectively. Its lightweight texture is designed not to clog pores while still supporting deep hydration and barrier recovery.

It absorbs quickly without stickiness or a heavy film. Suitable for sensitive skin prone to irritation and redness, including after shaving.

Key ingredients: Glucose; Panthenol; Ceramide NP; Jojoba Seed Oil; Squalane

Composition/INCI: Polyquaternium-51, Cetearyl Olivate, Jojoba Seed Oil, Glyceryl Caprylate, Sodium Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Glucose, Disodium EDTA, Polysorbate 60, Dimethicone, Cellulose Gum, Ethylhexylglycerin, Cholesterol, Sorbitan Isostearate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Betaine, Panthenol, Lactobacillus Ferment Lysate, Vegetable Oil, C12-16 Alcohols, Stearic Acid, Phytosterols, Levulinic Acid, Shea Butter, Carbomer, Squalane, Sodium Acetate, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Dipeptide-2, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Ceramide NP (5,075 ppm), Fig Fruit Extract, Glyceryl Stearate, Palmitic Acid, Xanthan Gum, Butylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Water, Tocopheryl Acetate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Raffinose, Sorbitan Olivate, Microcrystalline Cellulose, Glyceryl Glucoside, Tromethamine, Biosaccharide Gum-1, p-Anisic Acid, Centella Asiatica Extract, Glycerin, PEG-100 Stearate, Cetearyl Glucoside

name: Age Control Multi Vita Mask
text:
SUR.MEDIC+ — Age Control Multi Vita Mask

Time to feed your skin with vitamins. This anti-aging sheet mask is soaked in an ampoule-like essence with multivitamins designed to refresh, support regeneration, and nourish the skin for a healthier-looking glow.

A balanced fruit complex helps tone, visually even the complexion for a brightening effect, deeply hydrate, and support wrinkle smoothing. Niacinamide and adenosine contribute to a firmer-looking effect and help support elasticity while calming the look of inflammation.

Key ingredients: Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate; Adenosine; Grapefruit Extract; Niacinamide; Lemon Extract

Composition/INCI: Glycereth-26, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Phytosteryl/Octyldodecyl Lauroyl Glutamate, Water, Ceramide NP, Butylene Glycol, PEG/PPG-17/6 Copolymer, Phenoxyethanol, PEG-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Sodium Hyaluronate, PEG-32, Glycerin, Arginine, Niacinamide, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride
how_to_use: After toner, apply the mask to clean facial skin. Leave on for 10–15 minutes, then remove and pat remaining essence into face and neck. Single use.

name: Galactomy Enzyme Peeling Gel
text:
Ma:nyo — Galactomy Enzyme Peeling Gel

An enzyme peeling gel with Galactomyces that helps refresh the skin by gently exfoliating dead cells—supporting a cleaner look, improved firmness, and radiance. Helps with the look of enlarged pores, excess shine, breakouts, and pigmentation.

Enzymes are protein molecules made of amino-acid chains. They act more gently than AHA/BHA acids. With water, they help loosen bonds between surface dead cells so they can be removed more comfortably and pores look cleaner.

With consistent use, the skin can look smoother, fine lines can look less pronounced, and overall tone can look healthier. Suitable for all skin types and conditions, including sensitive and dehydrated skin.

Key ingredients: Galactomyces Ferment Filtrate; Cellulose; Papain

Composition/INCI: Papain, Glucose, Disodium EDTA, Xylitylglucoside, Quaternium-60, Dipropylene Glycol, Gluconolactone, Maltodextrin, Sodium Metabisulfite, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Carbomer, Ylang Ylang Flower Oil, Xylitol, Propylene Glycol, Potassium Hyaluronate, Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Allantoin, C12-14 Pareth-12, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hyaluronate, Limonene, Anhydroxylitol, Acetylated Sodium Hyaluronate, Patchouli Oil, 1,2-Hexanediol, Water, Cellulose, Galactomyces Ferment Filtrate, Orange Peel Oil, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid
how_to_use: Apply to clean, damp skin and massage until “pilling” forms, focusing on areas that need extra cleansing. Rinse thoroughly with warm water.

name: Pure Aqua Peeling Gel
text:
Ma:nyo – Pure Aqua Peeling Gel

If the word “peeling” makes you think of something invasive or irritating—forget it. This gentle gel provides a subtle, comfortable exfoliating effect. Skin feels smoother and softer, tone looks more even, and skincare absorbs faster.

The formula includes Siberian fir oil—an ingredient especially close to the 82Box project founder.

Composition/INCI: Disodium EDTA, Quaternium-60, Coptis Japonica Root Extract, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Dipropylene Glycol, Gluconolactone, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Carbomer, Butylene Glycol, Propylene Glycol, Lemon Peel Oil, Siberian Fir Oil, Allantoin, C12-14 Pareth-12, Rosemary Leaf Oil, Acetylated Sodium Hyaluronate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Water, Cellulose
how_to_use: Apply to clean, slightly damp skin and massage, focusing on areas needing extra cleansing. Use 1–2 times per week.

name: Effect Energy Supplement Mask
text:
WONJIN — Effect Energy Supplement Mask

It may not replace a full 8-hour sleep, but you’re likely to look fresher after using it. A blend of 36 revitalizing ingredients delivers a noticeable “wow” effect right after application.

A peptide complex supports skin recovery, helps support collagen-related pathways, and nourishes the skin for a more energized look.

Key ingredients: Niacinamide (Vitamin B3); 6 types of Hyaluronic Acid; Vitamin E; Vitamin B6; Vitamin C; Amino Acid Complex
